[Or ]thams cad kyi tshul 'as 'bar ba'i kha che brdzing 'od gas 'a ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nye 'od mada'i dpal gzi brjid kyi rgyal po 'od gsal pa laphyaga' tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs/
pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dang la gyi gadri brjid 'od gas 'dra ba 'a phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags ba de zlumu 'bur ba 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dpalagyisnying po nor
bu 'ong gsal ba la phyag batsha'ada'// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs pa rinatshan 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur rgyas par yon tan grags pa zad mi shes pa'i 'od zar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho shugs yon tan grags pa'i dbang
phyug 'od zer la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshag pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasab rnams par grol ba'i brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od thar la phug
tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs ba rtse la ba thams cad rnam par dag pasamyos pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasal sgrub bzang po'i smonalamatshul 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de
khazhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyan du 'byung ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegasang yig stong pa'i 'od khrar la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa bcu las 'da' ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma mang pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tsha' 'ako/
de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po bden pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal// da bzhin gangshegs pa zlob 'phags pa'i 'od zer la phyag tsAtshal/ de bzhin gshegs pasnang ba'i bod thar laphyag 'tshal la
nga bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sngos pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs bod kun tu 'dri ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blana'ang ba mtha' yas 'od zer la phug
khatshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stong las 'dul ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs rag na mi len pa'i 'ong zur phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i
dkyil 'khor 'od zer la phyag 'tshal 'de// de bzhin gangshegs pa gdonami za ba'i 'od sbar la phyag 'tshalale// dbazhin gshegs pa rab tu khrel ba'i 'od grar la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin
ga shegs pa sangs rgyus me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ba'i 'ong bar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa sprin chen 'ong zer la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshags pa
ma med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// dngazhin gshegs pa 'od za gyasgol phyag 'tshol lo// da bzhin gshegs pa 'od zamanyid 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs bam tog 'od/
bar la phyag 'tsha' 'a'o// dbazhin gshegs pa kun tsu'od brar la phyag 'tshal// dbazhin gshegs pa rab tumang ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshol 'go/ dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon dumakhyen pa'i bod

khrer la phyag 'tshal lo// deng zhin gshags pa ngos kyi 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dri'i ba tu gtong ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshul 'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi dbang
u0f09 rnam par bstan pa 'a'od zaralaphyag 'tshal dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rnam par rgyas pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa na skyen/

mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu bzang ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa kun gyi sgo mo bzang ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshol 'dod
zla/ de bzhin gshags pa kun tu ye shes gsal ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba 'dapal ri rang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa chos kyi mar ma dpal ri
khab la phyag 'tshal lo// dang zhin gshegs pa dpala'i rab bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang la gyi ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo
de bzhinag shegs pa nor bu ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa re bting la phyag ma tshul lo// de nga zhin ga'ags ra ra rAn ri rab la thug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gangshegs dad
rang ran po 'a phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po bzang la phyag myurol lo// de bzhin gshags pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nam
ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa bsod nams chen po'i ri pab la phyag 'tshal lo// dngazhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho ba'i ri rab 'khyag 'tshul lo// de nga zhinagshegs pa brjod/
ba'i ri la ba la phyag batshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chen rana' ba 'ong zar ri rab la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis me thub ri rang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
mngon du ba phags pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i la ba la phyag 'tshal la/ 'de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho ra ri ba la phyag 'tshal ka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i
rang la phyag 'tshal le// dbazhin gshegs pa dri ma rtog ri rang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag nga 'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lan ma ldog pa'i
rang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i ri rab laphyag tsa'// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa 'i ra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu la phyag 'tshal le/
dra bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid dpal gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar gyi ri bo la phyag/
kha tsal 'do// de bzhin gshegs pa zhiba'i bod zab mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dpal brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhigshegs pa chos kyi mthu dpalabar gas
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa spobs pa brtsa gas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar rinachen 'byung gnas gdugs bcu gas pa la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gsheg
pa ri bo bcu gas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri brtsagasapa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'go btsugs la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa gcig brtsi
la phyag 'tshulalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ren chen m tog pad+ma brtsigs pa la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od brtsag
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya che ba'i 'od la phyag batshul 'de// de bzhin ga shegs pa dpa' bo 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/
nga bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
[p/]mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yangs pa 'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gshegs pa rin rgyan
pad+ma 'od la phyag 'tshal// dbazhinagshegs pa rin chen mang po bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin ga shegasapagatsug gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'al phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dzamadu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gser khrod laphyag 'tshal 'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dpalam tog gabri brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa chos kyi sgo kun tu gsung ba rtsa ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nos kyi 'od zar ri rab rtswa mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i chos kyi
nga yi shes rtsa mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thams cad 'dogasna tshogs nor bu gdugs kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu grag
pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod dang la gyi rgyalapo'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtong bar grags par mdzad pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshul lo//
da bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i blo gros la phyag 'atsal 'de// dbazhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa smin mtshams dpa'/
srung ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mtshams su ye shes 'od dpal gyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pasmin mtshums rjes su song ba'i chos kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rang du zhi ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshalalago dbazhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i blo gro
la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rong med pa dpal gyi sprul pa blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yashes blo gros la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
sa su 'dzin pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tsha' la// dbazhin gshegs pa mi thogs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi ngan na pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de/
bzhin gshags pa lha'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bla bres la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin ga shags pa rnam par bsgoms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal la
de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shags pa blo gros nyid la phyag 'tshal lo//
da bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i blo gras la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rtenagyi khams kun gyi dbang phyag gi/
rgyu la de la phyag 'tshal 'de/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/
pa dbang phyug nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa marnyog gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/
'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i dbang phyug la phyag batshul lo// dbazhinag shags pa 'jig med kun tu bzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhinagshegs pa chos mngon du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yi ngos
kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjidadabang phyug la phyag 'alo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshang
pa'i dbang phyugal phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshags pa tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha' la// da bzhin gshags pa dbyangs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya
mur sngal nga'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshul la/ de bzhin gshags pa zla 'od khams kyi dbang pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma'i dbang phyug la phyag
'tshul 'a'o// da bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags ba 'od drisamed ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pam tog snying po la phyag 'tshal 'go/
jibazhinagshegs pa yon tan pa de dad la gyi snying po la phyag 'tshul la/ 'dabazhin gshegs pa ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa kluba'i snying po la phyag 'ats+tshal go/ de bzhin
gshags pa rtema'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa padro dpal gyisnying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po'asnying pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngabazhin
gangshegs pa lha'i dpalagyi snying bo la phyag TAtshul 'de// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying bo la phyag 'tshal la// da bzhinagshegs pa kun tu 'char ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal 'de// de bzhin/
ga shegs pa dpalakyi me tog snying po la phyag 'tshun// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun snang b.rin chen pado'i bod kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa chos kyi ya
'byung 'akun tu gzugs bar nasnying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagags pa gsar 'od bargyar rab tu gsal ba'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od tshad
samad par sprul ba'i gzugs brnyanasnying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tanarin chen gzi brjid dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshub// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dbang nor bu'i
snying po la phyog 'atsal 'do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od sna tshogs rab la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs pas la'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying bo la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshog
paratshan pa do kun tu snang nga'i snying po' phyag rtatshul 'a gdu ngazhani gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i drangal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chenumtshan gyis brgyan
pa ni ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od bar ra bo 'khyag 'tshul 'go/ de bzhin ba shags pa'i n chen gtsobo la phyag 'tshol la// dbazhin gshegs pa'i n
chen dbyang gnas 'du gal tshulo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ma la phyag 'tshal la// dengazhin gshegs pa rin chen ma'i 'khor 'al phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
sdong po lo phyug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal la// nga nga zhin gshags pa'i nanagatsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bung
po la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashagasaparin chen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa rin chen yon tanumtshan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ debazhib/ shags pa rin rgyan grags pa la phyag 'al lo// dbazhin/
[D]/ gshag bzhinanyen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhin gshegs pa'in rkyen shin tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs brtan skar mda' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshakas pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa langashes 'od lnga dpal gyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshol 'gro/ de bzhin gshegs pa po na tan dang la gyi rgya mtshol/
lho phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang byed yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa pha rol tu
phyin pa kun lam chags pa'i yon tan rgya mtshokun la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od dga' ba'i stobs kyi rgya mtshor phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos mtsho'abyung
zhi pa'i dpyad la phyag 'tshol go/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sprin 'byung dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa
dang la rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa rgya mtsho gAl phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya matso la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la//
phyag 'tshal lo// deng nag zhags pa gti mug ma bralabar sna ba'i blo gros 'dzoms par rnam par 'pharal phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs bdenangs ba rnam par 'bar la phyag 'tshal//
'od bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar bal phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshags bsang ge rnam bar 'phar ba la phyag 'tshul lo// nga bzhin gshegs pa/
ngorje rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rnam par 'aparab la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo rnam par thar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam bar phrar ba laphyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mo rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa pha rol gnon par 'phar ba la phyag
'tshal lo// da nga zhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shulaphyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshungs mchog gi lha la phyag tshul
le dubazhin gshegs pa shin tumakho ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong lha la phyag 'tshal 'gro// dbazhin gshegs pa bden pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po chen po'i lha la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhinag shegasapa 'jug lagyi lha la phyag 'tsholal//
dbazhinagshegs pa rgyan ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// rwa bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyima'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dang nga po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi dbang bo la phyag 'tshul lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinaka shegs pa dbang po chen po 'a phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro dbang pon po la phyaga' la god bzhin/
N+NaM ga shegs pa rtogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal 'a// de bzhin gshegs patshogs chen ngo 'dabang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'dzin ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// deng zhanugshegs pa zla ba'i dbang po la
pa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dubang po la phyag btsal 'a// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med
bar mngon du nyaphags pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nas mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa pado mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon dub pags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od thar yon rgya mtsho la phyag
'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dam pa la phyag 'tshal 'a ]/de bzhin gshegs pa sman padam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa/
rgyal mtshan dam pa la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam padam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu dam pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser dam pa la phyag 'tshal
lo de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la phyag tshul 'go/ de bzhin gshakas pa chos dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+modam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dre dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri mam
pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag tshul lo// de bzhinagshegs pa shin tu skyas
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dubazhin gshegs pa shin du sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu skar ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs nga
[! ]shin rnam par 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa shin tu rnam par snang ba laphyag 'tshal la// dbazhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshag
brgol ba shin tubcom la phyag 'tshal lo// dang zhin gshegs pa shin tu 'gro ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tulha mtshams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
ba shin tu mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal 'a// dang zhinag[–]shegs pa shin tu bzang ba 'a phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa/ shin tu yid bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegasapa
shani yid bad bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs ngangashin tu yongs su drag du 'a yon tan nachan rang lugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin s/
bad ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga 'gasapa rdzul mad dra mid tengang 'dza rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin
ga shags pa kun tu rinachen yon tana rnam par 'bar ba la phyag tshul 'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med gom pa rnam par 'phar bal phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa na/
dbyibs mang kun tu snang ba rnam par dag pa rang la phyag 'tsha' 'a// de bzhin gshags pa yashesa mngon du 'thalags pal dug tshul go/ dbazhin gshags pa lags snyoms pa mngon du
'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon du 'phags pa 'du phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin nangon du 'phags pa la phyag narolaso/
de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs med chos mchog chos dbyings mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad 'byin pa mngon du 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal
la/ de bzhin go shagasapa spyod pa tham sa cad kyi 'od mngon du 'phags pa la phyag ba tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pa shes kyi 'byung gnas la phyag rtal la// de bzhin gshegs pa gse
gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen Tabyung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pa
'byung gnas 'phyag tshar la// dbazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de ngazhin ga shegs pa chos dkar po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// nga bzhin
gshigs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'byunga gnas la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa byang chub yan lag ma rtog gi 'byang kanan la phyag 'tshul 'a ]/dbazhin gags pa chos nyid kyi 'byung nas la phyag 'tshal lo// dra
bzhin gshegs pa kun tu thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa dang ba'i skalaM phug 'tshul lo// dpazhin gshegs pa shin tu dang ba'i skal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
pa shin tures pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma tog shonatu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gangshegs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mo rab turgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pas kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la/
phyagaratsha'i lo// de bzhin gdags pa mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nga zhin gshegs pa 'od zer gdon mi za pa rab tu rgyas pa'i ska 'a phug 'tshul lo// de bzhin
gshags pa chos kyi snangapa rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'phros pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
tshungs pa'i nga re la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprinagying ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthun pa'i nga ro 'khug 'tshala'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thab ma seng ge
phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhinagshegs pa rngadabug nga rol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa sprin gyi dra'i nga ro la phyag 'tshol la/ de bzhin gshalas nga sprin gyi nga ro la phyag 'tshol le//
de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sang gan+ti nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ de
bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad shin tu bsgrags pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshul go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas chos kyi dbyings kyang re la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs
ba 'od brar kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi ni gshags nga gzhal med phung po la phyag nupal/ dang nyin ga shags parus nor bu'i rtse mo'i phung po la zug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs
pa dang shes brtan ba'i 'od zer dra ba dbyings kyi phung bo la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa nye bar bsags pa'i phung pa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pas 'du'i dbang po'i phung por
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun rdzob
kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i pung pa 2 phyag 'tshal te// de bzhinagshegs pa kun tu dang ba'i phung po la phyug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa za ma/
tog sbyin la phyag 'tshulalo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin mtshams sbyin la phyag 'tshol 'go/ dbazhinaka shags
pa sbyin pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'am sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sbyin la phyag 'tshul la// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs mchog sbyin la phyag
'tshal 'go/ dbazhin gshegs pa tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba sbyin la phyagaba'o le// de bzhin gshegs pa gtong ba sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa klu sbyin l phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pas nags rgyas sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang/'a bosbyin
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ma 'a yA la phyag 'tshal// dbazhin gshags pa dris med pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgya
ba bamatha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa
phyag mtha' yas la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdan matha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/
0 pa dge ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shes pa gdugs mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga/
pa blobaskal pa grangs med par ngasagA pa la phyag 'tshal la// du bzhinugashagasapa blo rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal ko/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bzhin
gshegasang blo dpag tu medupa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa blo zla ba lta bu la phyag 'tshal la// da ngazhin gshegs pa blo nam mkha' lta bu la phyag 'tshal la/ dbazhin gsheg/
pa blo shin tu mi tshugs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs ba tshad med pa'i stobs 'byung ba'i blosang ge'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags
pa rin rin mtshan gyis brgyan zla ba'i blo 'o phyag 'tshul 'a// de bzhinagshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tugakhrug
brnyan 'od gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gtsug tor la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma mad pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tsha'i'ado// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od zer snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa yang shes 'byung gnas gtsug tor la phyug 'tshul 'do// de bzhin gshegs
ba lha'i dbang po'igatsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs nganor bu'i gtsug tor la'atshal lo/ dpa'
gshegs pa 'jigs pamed par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin ga shegs pa 'dzags par bston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs pa shin tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de
ts+tshA bzhin gshags pa 'jigs pa dang thami dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa 'jigs bu mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa mngon du mdzad
pa 'phyag 'tshol la// de bzhinagazhin gshags pa 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshol 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigasang stobs la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa 'jigs pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal ko/ de bzhinagshegs pa 'jigs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ da bzhin gshegasab rnam par brilagyis gnol
la phyag 'tshul lo// dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pam tog zil gyis gnon ba la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ya shes
tsha zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshala'// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid khril gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dbyangs zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal//
dbazhin gshegs pa mi mthong zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po rngal gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs pa dbang po zhing la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ying zhi ba latsug 'tsha' la// de bzhinakashegs pa zhu ba nyid la phyag 'tshal/
lo dbazhin gshags pa zhi ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang zhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ra tu zhib 'a phyag nAtshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pami thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa shin mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal
la dbazhin gshegs pa de rje la phyag 'tshal go/ de nyin gshegs pa rdo rjes ma nga la phyag btsal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo// d bzhi di gshagrags pa rje
ye shesa'i go la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu ris la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes ri bo 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal le// da pazhin gshegs pa/
ga ]@#// rdo rje'i lte ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs ba rdo rje'ajoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinAgshegs pa rdo rdzipad+mo bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
bdodza 'babla ma la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo khyod kyi bla ma la phyag 'tshul la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i bla ma la phyags tshul lo// de bzhinagshegs pa yan lag bla ma la

phyag 'tshal lo// dang zhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin bla ma la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhin gshegs pa rdo rje pad+mo nyid kyi blam la phyag 'tshal 'a'o// dbazhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bla ma la phyag
sgyu 'tshul lego/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma nyid la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bod dpal gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang bar 'phur
bsangag 'dra phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa mi 'jigs pa'i rdo rje ma bu chen sang ga la phyag 'tshul lo// dbazhin gsheg pa chen mamakha' 'od gsal 'od kyi gdang ga la phyag 'tshal lo//
dengazhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba'i sang gra la phyag 'tshal 'a'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi maram 'barapa'i yashes seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
ga shags pa snying rje chun po'i sing ga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pas nag ge rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i stabs la phyag 'atsal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la phyug 'tshol lo/
de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pachos nam mkha' dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
gtsang bsnyams rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong mang rnamarar snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs baspyanami 'dzums pa rnam par snang mdzad la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dpal 'bar pas ro'ang shin tu rnam par snang mdzad la phyagatsAtshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pakun tu 'od gsolanAm mkha'i dbyangs rnam par snang
mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyud las rnam par 'phar bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinag shags pabade bar bzhud pa
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu zhi ba'i gzugs su bzhud pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshags pa yang
ngag par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa mi rung bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nga bzhin gshegs pa
@#// zhi ba'i pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa dang 'a dang gtumad pa'i yon tan mang ba 'das pa'i rgyan lta bu la phyag 'tshal la// dbazhin
de gshegs pa rin chen yon tan dpal rgyan gzi brjid phung po lta bu la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhin ga shegs pa 'od lngar 'bar ba'i ri bo dang la rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa
ri bo dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal la/ 'ad bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgya mtsho rab tu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa 'od
rgyan gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal 'do// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brasod nams brimi brad pa'i rgya mdo rab tu rgyun la phyag 'tshal// da bzhin
gshegs pa grags ldan l phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthar yas ldan la phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshog
ba pa grags pa ma bra' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshagras ba gragasagatsung shar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jigs bral grags la phyag tsAtsAla'// de bzhin gshegs pa zla na phros grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba grags pa la phyag 'tshal
la dngazhin gshegs pa mthu chen rdzogs rje brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen brtson 'grus 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs pa mthu chen brtson 'grus
la phyag 'tshala'// dbazhinag shigs pa brtson 'grus chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson grus mtha' yas
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus che ba la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams
cang dga' bar ston par mngon du 'a bkas pa'i rtson 'grus chen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu na dar dag la dris na nga nga ra 'barang la phyag 'tshal 'a// de bzhin
gshegs pa bsam pa chen por 'khar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhinagshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'barab laphyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan de bar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grol bar 'o b.rub la phug
'tsha' la// de bzhin gshegs pata ma la'i 'a ma tsan dan dre la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri thams cad 'bar pa'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
kun tudri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pakun tudrim yin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
[Or/ ]dri zhal sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de ngazhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa dril la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban khang la
phyag 'tshalo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par dag pa'i ya shasume tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de nga zhinagshegs pa chos dbyings me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gragshegs pa/
kun tu 'bar ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chanam tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa kumar gtor ba'amatog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/
pa kun tu snang ba'am tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu thul ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshala'// da bzhun gshegs pa rin cham tog de la phyag 'tshal la// da bzhin
klu gshags bame tog phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dkar ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagasheg
pa dga' ba'i yan 'a/ga la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinag shags pa mi snon pa'i yan lag 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i yan lag la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
pa yan lag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags po rnamu nga ra bya ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo//
bzhen ga bkas nga don thams cad gzigs pa la phyag b+hAtshul la// de bzhin gshags bu thams cad du gzigs pa la phyag d+hAtshul 'a// de bzhin gshags pa sgrib pa med par gzigs
pa la thug tshul la/ 'ad bzhin gshagasang don gcig tu gzigang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinag 'gasapa gdan mi blabaragazigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gangashugasapa don du
gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ra bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhinag shegs pa ros gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa 'jigs med/
la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin ga shegs pa gang du'ang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs
pa dang bra' nga' phug 'tshul 'do// nga nga zhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa rnam par sbangs pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/
sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong ba'i brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/// bam po gsum pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par ba 'a
ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mang du ldan pa 'a phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa phunasum ldan la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gshegs pa//
phun sum nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum rnam par 'byung ba la phyag 'atsal 'do// de bzhin gshegs pa/
snang ba ragyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bun sum ma sbas pa 'a pyag 'atsalal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'o na tan thams nga' byang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa rab 'phro ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinag shegs pa shin tu spungs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mo btsu gnas la phyag tshul lo// de
zabazhin gshegs pa lnga la pa la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsal pa'i phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashekas nga 'a
tu zhi ba drimanog gi lceb la phyag 'tshul 'do// dang zhin gshegs pa dus gsum rkub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dngazhin ga shags pa 'i bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshul ga/ dbazhin gshegs pa/
yadakyilci mo la phyag 'tshal 'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa yid kyi mnog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pasems kyi marnyog
laphyag 'atsal la// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yidu 'ong bar gsungab la phyag 'tshol 'a// dbazhin gshegs pa 'khor le'agasung
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtanapa lu phuga'atshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal
la dbazhin gshegs pa ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rang ston pa la phyag 'tshal la// dbazhin gshegs pa kun tumachod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/
gangshegs pa tshangs pa'i lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa dang 'bartan pa 'a sde 'joms dag spangs la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa spangs pa
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinig shegs nga tsabazhin pa rjes su ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po
la phyag 'atsal 'a// du bzhin gshegs pa smon pa med pa la phyag 'tshol la// dbazhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'abyung bar gsang ba la phyag 'tshal la// dbazhin gshegs pa 'od srungs
la phyag 'tshal 'a// nga zhin gshegs pa dgra thur pa la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa thogam sams bskyed pa'i the tshom gcod pa nyon mongs nga sbyongab la phyag 'tshal 'a//
dbazhin gshegs pa yi dam kun bsgrags thatshom gcodapa laphug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs
pas mchod la phyagaratshul lo// dbazhin gshegs pa nyes la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang zhin gshegs pa rdul dang bra' da' phyag 'tshala'a'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu bsnyams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshangs pa la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs paka'u di rgyalaphyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tsha'// de bzhinakagshegs pa skagang 'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob 'a phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tumtshan smos la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshags pa mdzas pa'i rigs can la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can la phyag la// dbazhinag shegs pa thugasadz+dzachen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs pa rtag ngunan tan mdzod 'ag phyag
'atsa'// de bzhinagshegs pa khums pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od shar ngs la phyag 'tshal 'de// de bzhinagshegs pa ma doman dara'i dra bsung la phyag
batshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i tshul 'dzin sgra 'byin dabyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog mngon bar mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rnas
par 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu ma nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar/
gyi dus sku brgyan pa la phyag tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa so sor dmigs pas brgyan la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhinaka shegs pa dkarang nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin
ga shagasapo 'ab tu snang ba 'gyad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa tsanadan la phyag 'atsal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
brgyas pa la phyag 'tshala'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ba chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thos par mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'a// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
par gzigs la phyag 'tshal le/ dbazhin gshegs pa bdud 'tshub la phyag 'tshal go/ da bzhin gshegs pa sred pa 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
nam mkha'isams gzugs nganagyi gzugs la phyag 'tsha' 'ako/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dpa' ba can la phyag 'tshul
la de bzhin gshegs pa gdul dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dengazhin gshegs pa dgra med la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes pa 'du shes can
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa yang shes 'od zer 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ra stag lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'dzin la
phyag 'tsha' 'do// du ngazhin gshegs pa 'gro rnams dga' la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshags pa dga' bcan la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dga' ba skad nga la phug tu
la de bzhin ga 'gas pa spyan bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bshad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinakasheg
pa rnam par sbyor ba 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagasheg pa rnam pa du ma ma dzad pa laphyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa mthor gshegos pa la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs
panor bu'ab la phyag 'tshal lego/ de bzhin gags pa kha lasgyur ba la phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ya shes sgo dbyas mdzod mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs/
bkun tu spyod pa' ye shes kun tum nor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa rinachan bzang la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gog par gzhol la phyag tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rdzogar zhal la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyisami tshugs yi shes gnas la phyag 'tshal 'go dbazhin gshegs pa gtsug la phyug 'tshul
la dubazhinagshegs pa bsam gyi mi khyab ba la phyag tshul go/ de bzhinagshegs pa me tog zab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par brjid pa la phyag 'tshal 'go
dbazhinagshegs pa rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga 'gas pa spyod pa thams cad sbyong ba 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa la byang rnal la phyag 'tshal lo/ de
bzhin gangshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gdul dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan danar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/
de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma byang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dgongs pa la phyag 'tshol lego/ de bzhin gshags bachos kyi spyanabaden pa la phyag 'tshal ko/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyema'i gzigs brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse la nga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshag
pa sems rtse gcig tu thub pa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhinagshegs pa bden par gsungs la phyag 'tshal 'do// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa la phyag tshul lego/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
rab rtabarjod la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshags pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i go la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma la' 'am la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
bgaza' yas rnam par sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mamed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhinagshegs dang bal glang 'gying ba'i 'gros bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo//
dpazhin gshegs pa blo gros thogs pa mang la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa gsung rab chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasapa mun bsal ba la phyag 'tshal ko/
de bzhin gshegs pa snyakhor stong la phyag 'tshal 'o// dbazhin gshegs pa 'phags skyes po la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhinagshegs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tsha' 'o// dang zhin gshog
pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa chu bo badrem bugs/ra la phyag 'tshol lako/ dngazhin gshegs pa rna ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa ut+pal la phyag 'tshal
le re bzhinag shegs pa chu stod la phyag 'tshalale// de bzhinakagshegs pasu'al phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gtso gol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags
pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra ba mad pa laphyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
khar zhib la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma rgya cher phyag 'tshal lo/ dbazhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
dbu na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pas sor dmigs pa'i rgyunas nius laphyag 'atsal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge brlud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa 'byor pa la phyag 'tshala'// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i
gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs rnam bar bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lago/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdonami zaba'i gzibarjid la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin
gshegs pa bdud sde'isgra rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal ko/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs kha dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal la// dbazhin
gshegs pa la bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams rab tu sgrol ba la phyag tshal lo/
de bzhin gshegs pa rim 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin sa pa la phyag 'tshal// gang gis bsod namasamatha' med
grangs med pa las byung ba'i de bzhinagshegs pa'i mtshan mang po 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun rlab pa ra khyad dam/ rjesasu dran zhing bsgoms na/ de dag lamig nad med par 'gyur/ rna nad med
snand med/ lce nad mod/ lus nadand cing/ sgrib pa than sa cad rnam par 'byang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa byed pa mi 'byung/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sla
mi ldeg par gyur/ phyogs thams cad kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisadagongs par 'gyur/ dadag gis de la rta gzhu bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbradang d mdzad do// mngon du bum/
rlung dun rmi lam du'ang rung ste 1 bsam gyis mi khyab patsi ye shes rab dang/ thabs 2 mkhas dra ra mngon du ston ta/ can s myur du ting de 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo se ser thob pa ra mdzad do//
nams kyang sangs rgyas b.rom ldan 'das dang sangs rgyus kyibastan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur rin pa che pad+molas rdzus te skyabarang/ rnams kyang skyes bu chen po 'amatsan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dang
byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan par gyur/ mngon ng ra shes pa rnams dang/ spyan ljadang/ sems can smin par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
ma dang byang chub kyi phyogasakyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ bsam gtan dang tshang mang ba rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ro// stobs dang/ mi 'jig
ra dang/ so sa kun tu rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangasargyus
kyi ches grangs med tshad mad pa gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/ ji ltar sangs bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi yon tan du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ da dag la yang na sum tshogs pa ring
par mi thogs por gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub bde bar myur du mngon sum par byang chub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshakas nga spobs pa ringapa'
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la phyag 'tsha'i lo// da bzhin gshegs pa sngan chen ngo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'atsa'/

lo tang shA/ byur d+har sdus/ blatupra tiSh+Thad sAhA/ de bzhin gshegasapa sbyar nan phyogs thams cad du maram 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshala'/ tad+ya thA/ pra dI pa pra te ri dzA na padIpa sngas+sa/

de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ter-itongo/ dzAn te// bud+d+hAtetshe d+harmate ngos hA dbazhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA pra ti
[© ] te/ sarbadra te/ ba'i pU ra Ni brdzus mu drad sharisAhA/ de bzhin gshegs nga tshos brjod pa'i dkyil ba kho ra mar ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dang/ kluTikI Ni/ sarba

ba karma A ba ra Nin/ bud+d+ha sad ngan/ d+harmas da khyen/ sang gsad skyon swAhA/ de bzhinagshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal 'go/ tad+ya thA/tsan dra pra b+he/ sUr+ya paD+ha/ tsan dra su rtsa

sha ta sAhas te ra ki pra b+ha bi sho ng+ha ya dzAn tsakA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tung h+pha/ d+harma bya hadzAn byuha sAny+tsa/ dbazhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal po la phyag

'tshol la// tad+ya thA/ d+haratA ra/ dz+nyA na kAya pa rigau d+ha na/ don pa ri pu ra Ni/ ta tha tA a ba bats+tshanishA g+ham swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dram mang par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ta thA/ ba su le/ go ru

ri pU ra pa// pA ra ya/ sarba A shAdzAn ad+hiT+ThitaM/ sarbabud+d+haM a d+hiT+Thito/ sarba bo d+his tA a d+hiShi ta swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs rdul med la phyag 'tshol 'go/ tang ba/bo ka ba ga/
rnyanas mu dra ba// ga gnas mu dra ba gi/ pA rami tAb ga/ sarba AshApa ri pU ra Ni/ ba ga bu rgyu a d+hiT+Thite sAhA/ sangs rgyas 'di dag sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di
skad ces gsungasate/ nam bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can gang gis nged kyi ming thos sam/ 'dzin tam/ bklags na de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par de
sa gyur cig/ mi khom pa brgyad las yongs su 'das shing/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon sum du dgongs te/ yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi
du skye bar shog cig/ de nas shi 'phos nas yang lhar bcas pas yongs su 'dzin par shog cig/ 'jigapa thams cad las shin tu'adas par shog cig/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
'di dag gi mtshan 'dzin pa de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadapar zung zhig/ de ste byang chub sams dpa' byams pa mthong bar 'dod na/ ngesaci nus par mchod
ba byas te/ 'bum du bzlas par bya'o// kun tu yang gtsang zhing byams pa'i sa mos su bya/ das kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod na yang dag de bzhin mnong de/ nyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o//
da lta yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mthong bar 'dod na/ de ltar marod pa byas te sum 'bum bzlas par bya'o// kun tu yang gtsang zhing byams pa'i sems su b.rus la/ nga
rgyal dang/ drags pa dang/ khro ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pad a'i mchog 'od gsal dpal gzi brjid snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tang glu/ sUr+ya sAru
dz+nyA na sUr swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po rnam pa du ma'i rgyal po dpal 'od gsal phyag 'tshal lo/ tad+ya thA/ shiri shi ri/ te dza shi ri sAhA/ de bzhin ga shegs pa skalang bye ba
grangs med par bsags pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sa mudra pas mu dra la/ dzAnas mu yeswAhA/ dbazhin gshegs chos tshul thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i gaN+Di/
brjid 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshul 'o// tad+ya thA/ gar b+he gar b+hadz+hanagar b+he swAhA/ dbazhin ga shags pa gser bzang nam mkha'aamang ga'i brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ga rnga

na ga ga ra/ go gca bi shud+d+he swAt+tA/ de bzhin gshags pa rin chen r rang la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya/ me ru mu ru ratama'u sAny+tsa/ de bzhinakashegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ su Ni
gu Na gu Na sa mu dre swAhA/dbazhinagshegs pa lan rgyun dbyangs dang 'a la phyag 'tshul 'a tad+yathA/ ge thug tshun thu sAhA/ de bzhinagshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal la//

tang thu/ sa mu dra samu dra dzA nas mu dre swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// tapyakhA/ d+hadzad+hadzod+ham d+hadzomA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'dzul

lo tangathA/ d+ha ra d+hare/ d+hAr Ni su drosAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos stobs 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// tang ba/ pa b+ho pa phyi d+harma prab+hi sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha'i ngang la

'a phyag 'tshal 'a// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hosu bud+d+ha hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ra ra ra rtsa mo snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA artsi a rtsi/ dzAni artsiswA hA/ de bzhin gshegs ba sbyin

0 gyi rtsa che la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ma g+han g+hamahAm gsAhU/ de bzhinag shegs pa nyem mar me dang la rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tang// pra tI pa pra dI po tsAn khra d+hiswAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa

zhing du sangs rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sam sa mo samany+dzita swahA/ de bzhinagshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tang 2/ dum dru ma dzAn dru'i sa hA/ dbazhin gshegs dra rnam

nga ra snyang na dzad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpya thA// gu skye gu rje gu Na me rU'i kha re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegasab sprinachen spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ni ni ni dzAnanim sAhA/ dngazhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshol lo// tang thu/ ba'i ba ri ba ro tsa na sngahA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po 'phyag 'tsha' 'a/ tangashu/ du habu hadzan bya gzigs// da bzhin gshegs nga chas
mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sam sa mas mu dra bkra ma Ne swahA/ de bzhin gshegs pagazi brjid dbu la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tatsho dzo donate dzi sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
chen mag+gan po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ in dre in dra in dra bi kra ma sU/ dbazhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal bzang la phyag 'tshal 'o// tad+yathA/ b+hang dre rgyud dra su byung deswAhA/

de bzhinakangshegs pa chos kun 'ong rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ pra b+ha prab+he dzAn pra b+ha sAhA/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rdo rje rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ tad+ya thA/ badzra badzra badzra ud ta ra
sA de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs stabs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a sang g+ho a sang g+ha bud+d+hi swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings gzugs brnyan la

phyag 'tsha' la// tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ma d+ha ra mad+ha ra ad+ha ra swahA dngabazhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu mar ma 'od kyi rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// tadu thu 3di na ri na ngan ga ra [E] su/ de bzhin gika

ba snying rje gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA ta dza ti dzag hAte dze swahA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkartsa thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lako/ tad+ya thA/ pra ti pra ta ta pa ri pArna swAhA/ de bzhin gsheg
zla pa bklod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// dang klu ma klu ma dzA na klu ma su// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor khong la phyag 'tshal la// 'du shu/ du phye pa byu dzan maN+Da'

prab+hU pAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyas manga' la phyag 'tshau0f00/ tabyas ra sa ra sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiwite swAhA/ de bzhin ga shegs pa zhi khong rgyal po la phyag 'tshol lo// dpya/ pa
zla shAn prashAn ta u pa pra kAn ta swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par rgyas pa la phyag tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ba pu la bi pu le dzAn bi pu la su/ de bzhin gshags pa chos rgya mtsho

shugs kyi rtse morgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sa mas ma sa ma spyi te swA hA/ dbazhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ tad+ya thA ma ram ra ma ra ti ka re swAhA/ngebazhin/
gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thu/ rgyun sgyu ma rgyum gru ma sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chus kyi dpal la ru ka 'tshal lo// tad byA/ shi shi ri shi ra ye swAhA/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa lha'i cod pan la phyag 'tshal lo// tang ba/ muku kha ma ku Ti d+harma ka mkho sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od khrar gzi brjidadapa' la phyag 'a 'a 'do// tad+ya thu/ dzaya dza ye dza a
ba ti swahA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis dngang nga 'a phyag 'tshal// du shu/ d+humarnyam na nad+mas sAny+tsa/ de bzhin gshegs pa man kha'i sgra la phyag 'atsal la// tadu thu/ gag na ga gan
ga ga na sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me lta phyag 'tshal lo/ tadu shu/ sam b+ha ba ma byung bus rtenas hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams dpal snang la phyag

'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ u ma su na/ u ma bti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba grags par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshol lo// tad+ya thA/ g+hoSh+Thag+ho ShA bud+d+ha g+ho kha ut+tA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dpal
la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sa sa ra shing swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa desa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal// tang te dza ti dze te dzab d+hisatwA/ dbazhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag
tsha' la// dung thA/ shi bsheb phu shing sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// tadu ba/ klu yi kA yekarma kA ya sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sgra dbyangs la phyag
'tshal lo// dung shu/ ru hu 'dug+ho Sha ra nye sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal le// tadu thu/ in dre in dre in dra ba ti swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon

ba tanargyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thU/ gu Ni kuNi gu Na sa mu dri ta swAhA/ de bzhinakashags pa bsod nams ri ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ pAr ya pA ra ya sa ma nor thu nAn b+hasngahA ra bzhin

gshegs pa gsang zhi ba la phyag 'tshal la/tad+ya thA sham sha mi 'amam ti swahA/ ngabazhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ dra b+hopra sa ra pra sa ra ni hAwA/ dbazhin gshegs

che ba me tog bzung ba bzhin dgongs ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tang ga/ mug na ku su de swAhA/ de bzhinag shegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang glu/ gan+d+hag+hA/ ta grwa ga ta gar b+he sngahU/

de bzhin gshegs pa rigs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yash+tsa/ sam byu ba sam b+ha ba/ pra ni d+hun sam b+ha bswAhA/ de bzhinag shags pa lha'i dbang po gtsug tor nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal
lo tadu thA/ de bde ba de ba 'dra pu dzi ti sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gseragyi yol phyag 'tshal// tang ba kan tsa ne kan tsan kan tsas dri'i sa// dbazhin gshegs ba rin chen bung po

la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ rate ra// dzA na'at+taM sAhA/ de bzhin gshegasapa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+harma d+harma d+hamad+harma sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs panor gyi dpal la

0phyag 'tshol la// tad+ya thA/ shar te thongashi ri ting ni swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ ya shas blo gros la phyag 'tshal la// tad+ya thA/ ba dza ba dzab na su hA/ dbazhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan
la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ shAn te shAn tepra sham ni sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dang 'aka' phyag 'tshol la// tad+ya thu/ ki'i ki ri ke turAdza sahA/ dngazhin gshegrwa ba zhiba'i mar me

dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sha ma ri pu pra sha ma ri pu shan to b+hA ba ri pu sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a ba b+ha se a ba b+hA se a ba b+hA sa
ka ra Ni sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bshol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ba bo ma le bi ma 'a te slat+tha/ dbazhin gshegs pa rima'i gaN+Di brjid 'phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ su ru su ru/
sur te ngo swahA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal ri rang la phyag 'tshala'o// tadu thu/ d+hi li d+hi ri/ d+hamapra ti sa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zas dang la la phyag 'tshal lo//
tang thu/ cir gyi ri rtser ci sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyi snying bo la phyag batshul go/ tad+ya thu/ de be deng/ de ba pu dzi ta swAhU/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng gabasgragasaklog gi
mar mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ so ma si ma/ bud+d+hA sing ga sa mi swahA/ dbazhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan mang ba'i sprin lo phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ma ru ma ru bud+d+ham ru swAhA/
de bzhin gshegs panam mkha'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/gagan ga tA ya swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rig pam nga po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya

sam b+ho sam b+ha ba byu hadu sAhA/ de bzhinagashegrwa pa grag pa rgyam tsho dbungs la phyag 'a tshul 'do// tad+ya thA/ gardza gardza ni sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbyings nga ro dbyangs la phyag 'tshal 'go/

tad+ya thA/ d+he d+ha ra Ni ban d+ha sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngas lnga pa'i sbyin la phyag 'tshal 'a/ tad+yathA/ nani ni me dzAn ma sAhA/ de bzhin gshags pa lha sgyu dang la la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sA

re grwa de bud+d+hA sA re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu kun gyi gzi brjodi la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ta rata ra bud+d+ha a d+hik+Shita na sAhA/ dbazhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// tapyayA/

samudadres mudadre/ d+hamad+ha tus mud dre swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sam b+habe sam b+ha bo sam b+ha ba tu bud+d+haa d+hiten sAhA/ bzhin gshegs pa yon

zla tanargya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ gu Na gu rje bats+tsha sam bya ba ku che sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sha dri'i re bra dwa nga shi'i sAhA/ de bzhin gsheg/
pa rgyal ba'i tim la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA dzin yonadzanasUr+ya sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin rnam par mang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ba su le ga gan bi pu la sa'u/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen dpal mar me'i yon tan gzi brjid la phuga'atshal lo// tad+yathu/ pra dI ba phra dI pa shi ri dzapra dIpa sngahA/ dang zhinagshegs pa dka' thub grub la phyag 'tshal la

tad+ya thA sid+d+his sits+tsha/ mo tsani ma k+Sha muka te/ ba mug te a ma le/ bi ma le/ mang+gale/ hi ra N+ya gar bya rat+tagan+d+he sarba an+d+ra sA d+ha ni nga ra nArA dz+hani/ ma na se/ masum nas/ ang rgyu te/ a

khyad ts+tshataM/ gIta b+ha yaM/ su bar Ni/ pra d+haglo/ pra a d+hu'itaM/ sarba ar the a pa rA dzi te/ sar tra pAtIhata/ tsa tu la bad+d+ha ko Ti b+ha li/ nam/ sarba sid+d+hinAm/ ta thA ga ta naMn sus+sa
gzungs 'di brjod nga/ tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so// gas bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar la de 'dra ba'i gzungs sngags zab mo
brjod pa ni legs so// gang gis gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ rtag tu rgyanami 'dud pa rgyas par yid la byed na/ rigs kyibu po da 'a sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin goshegs pa dri med 'od gsal gyis ljags kyi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon
par mdzad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag bdun cu po rnams la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa
0 @#// dang/ ci nus su mchod par byed pa de dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ji ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa drind 'od gsal la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po kun tu gleng gzhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag lamachod pa bgyis par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu grung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bkatIts+tsal to// rigs kyi
bu dag gang su yang rung ste/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na/ nang par sngar langs te/ ba lang gi lte bsadakyila 'khor dus la ma tog
dang bdugs pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phrangab dang/ ngug nga sa ci nus su mchod pa byas te/ 'du 'dzi mang po grangs la/ hrin gsum daban/ mtshun gsum dben par de bzhin gshegs pa dedag
gi mtshan dang/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dran par byas ba dang/ de bzhin gshags pa de dag gi bden pa'i tshig byin kyi rlabs pas na/ de'i da ltar gyi rma nyid la las kyi sgrib pa thams
cad yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal/// tadu bu/ tsan dre su tsan dra mA titsun dre/ tsan dra ki ri ni/ mi li ma li/ bud+d+ha a d+hita/ si sa li 3

bas m+maa d+hit+tite/ ki li ki li/ d+harmaa d+hiwete/ ki li ki lI/ sang rgyu a d+hiSh+Tha tis/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ba de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i matsanabarjod pa chung zhing
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nang par langs shing yid la byer na/ nga bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par 'ong ngo/ dmasakyang byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs pa bkra ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'irgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tadu thu shod ni d+dani/ sarba pA pa ba hor ni/ shud d+he bi shur D+ha sarbakar bi shud d+haM swAhA/ gang gis
de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'chang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid 'byas na di da ltar gyi tshe 'di nyid du las thams cad dang// sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha'

phyin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lo bya ba phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ mthar byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor la thug gi bar du de'i dag ba'i rtsa ba zad par
ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mig longs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tadu thu 1 tsaka tsak+Sha dzAn tsu swahA/ gang gisade bzhin gshegs pa 'ji'i mtshan 'dzin na nga lha dang
'jig rten du bcas pa'i ni ga lta bur 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par gyur ta/ ngag pa rtsa ba ni byang chub kyadakyil 'khor du thug gi bar du mi zar da// nga bzhin gshags pa
[©]// bal glang dri 'od gsal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thu ga ga dzeg dze/ ga dza in dra sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung pos
'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal rgyal po de'i mtshan brjod pa 'dzinan/ da lus sa 'o brgya phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du dri
'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ pu bu'usu pusAhA/ da' rogani ma tog
ji lta bur ba shims pa de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la gtor na de'i bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
bzung bar 'ong/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin rgyal po la phyag ba tshul lo// tad+ya thu/ d+hare rgyu re/ d+ha ra Ni ban d+he swahA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang gzungs sngags kyi tshig
'di'i dzin na/ des bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ tshams bab par 'ong/ sngags kyi tshig 'dri brgya rtsa brgyud du bzlas ta byin na/ ji snyad pa'i mi byams de bzhin du snyan
'a ma thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gcoka tu mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'phar ba'i khyu mchogargyal po la phyag 'tshul 'go/
ba/dbazhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po 'jug 'tshul 'ako/ dbazhin gshegs pa bden pa'i don la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinag bag
pa tshogs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkhar bskrun la phyag 'tshal la/ dngazhin gshegs pa grags nga 'i stobasakyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/da bzhin gshegrwa pa

bod rab tu 'gyad pa la phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshag pa las 'byung yon tan 'khrug ma'o/de bzhin gshegapa ma togasnachog dpal la phyag 'tshalo/de bzhinagashekAbabaspu ldab dang bral la phyag 'tshal//dbazhin gsheg pa ye shes

pa ut+pal dmar po'i dang 2 la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba las byung ba'i 'od rdar la phyag khatsa2

ba gdon mi tra bar yongs su thugs nga' phyag b+hAdza' la// da bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//

phyag 'tshal lo// nga bzhin gakas pa rin chen 'od 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ da bzhinagshegs pa 'od mtha' yas ya shes 'byung gnas 'phyag 'tshal lo/ drab zhin goshegs pa

gshegs pa gdon mi za nga'idapal kun tukrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo// da bzhin gshags/
sems bskyed du thag tu sems can kun gyi sams kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor

pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas kor la phyag 'tshal le// da bzhinagshegs pa yon tan ma 'a yas brtan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
[oo/]la dbazhin gshegs pa rin chen rkyen dang mag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'a'a'i dbang bo rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'byung la phyag 'tshal/

'phags ba bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa mtha' yas par 'phar pa la phyug 'tshal lo//

ga shags pa 'khor mchogamanga' kha la bud 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi ma tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal 'god/
bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa sams bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg

phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i ngang la phyag 'tshalaM 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa so sor brtan
pa'i yon tan sprul bo la phyag 'tshala'ago/ de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa ye shes dang 'a la phyag 'tshal// de bzhinagshegs pa dmigs pa med pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal 'do// dbazhinagshegs pa bod kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid kyi rgyal
bo la phyag 'tshal lo// dubazhin gshegs pa blo gros ra ba la phyag 'tshal la// dbazhinagshegs pa mthu chen phyug 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa dri ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshol la
dbazhin gshegs pa rdordzamos la phyag 'tshal go/ de bzhinagshegs pa rnam par dag nga 'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs ba 'phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa shin tu rtags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lego/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgrarab tu'ajoms pa
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pala'i dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa'i rang 'od la dug
'tshal lo// de bzhin bshegs pa'i ra ba 'od ma gru'i las dri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal ko dbazhin gshegs pa 'od dang gnad
la phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa budamad skyes par sbyar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal// dang zhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du bzhag
pa'i rgyal ngo la phyag 'tshal 'go/ dbazhinagshegs pa spos kyi ri rab 'jug 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pas naas can kun gyis sa dadwang la 'gyur ba yin pa shes ston la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mamed pa'i gzungs la phyag 'tshal 'do// dang zhin gshegs pa ye shes zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshol la// de bzhin gshigs pa mi tshugs pa'i dbyangs la phyaka/
'tshal lo// de bzhin gangshegs pa stobs rab tu gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rtsol ba khrumag ston pa 'a
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasang don grub la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal 'go/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshun lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtso gsum pa//
la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa dpal gyis shes la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshala'ago/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dpal la thug 'tshub

sgrub bdud rtsir 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshol go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dga' ba'artsol da la thug tshul la// dbazhin gshegs pa sbyor ba kun tugacod pa'i go la phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snga' pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags bachos thams cad gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs ra rjes sa cad ston pa la

pa las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa phyogs kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshalaM// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//

po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i gnas nas zhag bdun lon te byang nas/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ lha'i bu me khyab du mas

ba'i bstanatings kyang 'di nyid du gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'byed 'grogs kyi phyir de nyid bsnyad cing chos bstan to snyam nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas gnod sbyin gyibadag po//
'bod 'grogs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i gnas nas phyung ste/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang klu'i bu mo brgya stong du
mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ rgya mtsho'i bas la gzigs te/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rgya mtsho la 'jugapa'i rnam par shes pa yul gyi rlung gis bskyod cing/ nga dag gsemA
'byung bar gzigs te ched du rjod pa rmad du brjod par mdzad de zhes thos nas/ bdag song labcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste lang karagashogs par bya'o// da ni bdag dang
lha dang mi rnams la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyuro snyam ste/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po 'bod 'grogs 'khor dang bcas pa me togagi gzhal med khang du zhu
nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ 'khor dang bcas te gzhal med khang nas babs nas rnga dang sil snyan rnams rab tu bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas/ pi wang gi khog pa in+d+ra nIl la bu zlarludang mu su ras pas pa/ gos dur kapri yang ku dra ba yin tang med pas mchan du spus te/ 'khor
[D/ ] rnams rab tu dga' bar byas nas glu'i dbyangs sha lnga dang/ jisha ba dang/ 'ga' na rgyudang / d+habA ta deng/ nisha ta dang nad d+ham dang/ ku sha ka dang/ glu'i dbyangs mang por sbyar
ba la sogs pa dang ldan zhing rgyud rjesasumathun pa dang/ phyi zung ginang du chud par byas to/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis glu blangs pa/ sen sa kyi rang bzhin tshul nyid chos kyi gter/
tsho bdag med lta dang rnam bral dri mo med// so so rang rig ye shes ston pa yi// chos tshul mgon po 'dir yang bshad du gsol// dgaba'ichos kyi yang dag bsags pa'i sku// bde
ga shags 'phrul bas sprul pa ston pa ste// so so rang rig rtogs pa'i chos bgyis pa// lu pa deng ni lang kar gshagasang 'i dus// lang ka 'dini sngon gyi rgyal ba dang/ 'di yig sras/
rnams gzugs ma 'chang bar bzhugs// mgon po 'dir ni chos rab bshad du gsol// gzugs mang ldan pa'i ganod sbyin kun kyang nyan// daltar lang+ka'i bdag po 'bod 'grogs
kyis Ta ta ka yi rgyudang glu blangs nas// yang tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni dgung bdun te// chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ya// rgya mtsho'i debang/
sa/po gnas nas ni// slad du byung ste 'graman bzhugs// sangs rgyas bzhugs ma thag tu yang// ne tsosar nas brgyan pa yi// gnod sbyin rnam pa mang po dang// 'bod grogs/
lha mo lhan cig tu// mgon po gang na bzhugs pa yi// lamador 'phrul gyisaseng nas ni// me tog bzhin las babs nas kyang// de bzhin gshegs la mchod phug 'tshub//
rgya' ba'i dbang pos byin brlabs nas// de la mngon par ming bsnyad pa// bdagan 'god 'grogs na grin bcu ste// srin po 'dabang nga 'dir mchis so// gong rdal 'di na su gnas
dang bdag gi lang karjes su zung// rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas snga mas kyang// so so rang rig spyod yul ni// rtsa mo rin na brgyan pa yi// grong rdal dbus su rab tu bshad//
bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid kyi// zum rin chen brgyan pa la// rgyal ba'i sras kyis yo sa bskor cing// rdulamang chos ni bshad du gsol// gang rnams lang kar gnas pa dang//
bdag rug da rang/napar 'tshal// bshad pa'i tshul las rnam grol ba// so so rang rig spyod yul te/ 'alang kar gshegs pa'i mdosnga ni// sangs rgyas/snga mas gsungs pa'o//
rgyal ba'i sras kyis yongs bskor cing// sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par dran// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bshad du gsol// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung la yin/
sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras dag kyang// lha yi tshul te 'di nyid ni// rtse mo rin chen brgyan pa la// gnod sbyin rnams la thugs brtse phyir// 'dren pa sems ni ston/
kyi par 'gyur// lha yi lapa'i grong rdul ni// mdangs dga' ren chen sna tshogs dang/ 'brel sdis rdo stangs dga' ba dang// rin Ton dra ba'i bla ras brgyan// rnal 'byor nyas dang rnam bralab
so so rang rig sems pa yi// bcom ldan 'di ni gnod sbyin dag/ sangs rgyas sdums mdzad srung ba// theg chen tshul la dadapa yi// mngon par zhen cing gzhan mdzud pa// gnod sbyin/
( dang gnod sbyin du// theg chen rtogs par 'tshalab mchos// 'a dma' la yi rir// ston pa sangs rgyas gshegs su gsol// bum pa rna la sogs pa'i rnams// srin pogrong
rdal gnas pa dag/ theg pa che la rtog pa rnams// so so rang rnag nyan par 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams la bgyi bar gyis// de ltar na yang shin tu bgyid// bdag la rjes su thug
brtsa 'i phyir// langakar sras dang bcas te ga shags// khyim dang lha mo tshogs rnams dang// se mo do yang sna tshogs dang// mdangs dga' sa naka yi la// thub pa chen po bzhes su gsol
bdag ni rgyal sras de dgadang// sangs rgyas rnams kyibaka' bzhin bgyid// bdag gis mi dbul gcig ma mchis// thub pa chen pothugs brtsar dgongs// de yi tshig rnga gsan pa/
dang srid gsum dbang pos gsungs pa ni// gnod sbyin dbang po 'das pa yi// mgon pos rin chen ri bo la// so so rang rig chos rnams bstan// khyod nyid la yang thugs bcur/
dgongs// rin chen rnam brgyad ri bo la// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsungabar 'gyur// 'di ni rnal 'byor ldan pa dag/ mthong ba'i chos la steng pa'i gnas// nga dang sras rnams dang
gis kyang// gnod spyin dbang po bsdur dgongs rigs// bcom ldan gnang nas mi gsung bar// zhi ba'i blo yis rnam par bzhugs// 'bring 'grogs kyis ni phul ba yi// mdog
bzhin par bzhugs par gyur// de da du ni 'bod 'grogs dang// 'jigs med rgyal sras gzhan yang ste// lha mos bzhad gad rol mo yis// rab tu mchod cing grong du gshegs/
dga' ba'i grong rdal der gshegs nas// mchod pa rab/ yang b.rus so// 'bod 'grogs la solas gnod sbyin gyi// sde dang gnod sbyin tshos kyang mnod// gnod sbyin bu me
gnod sbyin bus// rin po chu yi dra bas mchod// 'bod bgrogasakyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// rinachen brgyan nga 'i se mede// rgyal ba'i srasadang rgyal ba yi// stod kyi yan lag rnam
btags// bcom ldan rgyal sras na khas bcas pa// mchod pa phul ba bzhes nas ni// sa so rang gi spyod yul gyi// chos ni rnam par bstan par mdzod// gnod sbyin sde dang 'bod
[z]@#/ 'grogs kyis// sna ba rnams kyi mchog mchod de// blo gros chen po rab mchodacing// gsol ba yang dang yang 'debs pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad la/
rang rig spyod yul 'drab yin/ 'dren bdag deng gnod sbyin dang// rgyalaba'i sras rnams nyun pa mchis// khyod la rgyal sras mkhas pa dang// gnod sprin rnams kyang gsal ba 'debs/
smra ba'i nang nas chen khyod// rnal 'byor can gyi'ang rnal 'byor zhugs// khyod la gus par gsal 'debasakyi// 'jigs pamed par tshul dris shog/ rang rgyal nyan thos rnams dang
lho na mu stegs nyes las rnam par grol// so so rang rig chos nyid gtsang// sangs rgyas s ni thob byed pa'o// rtswa mo rin chen brgyan pa dang// gzhan yang lha rdzas rnams kyis ni//
na nan bya bas brgyanapa dang// brtson ldan 'das kyis der sprul te// mgon pos ri bo ra ral// nyid kyi sku ni rab tu bstan// 'bod bgrogs gnod sbyin de dag ni// ril rnam
par gnas// thams cad 'khor nim bri bar// re ra na yang inatu snang// den zhing rnams thams cad dang// gang yang don 'don pa dang// de nasrin po' dbang po rnams// gang dag
lang kar gnas pa'i ng snang// de dang 'gran pa'ilangaka dang// a shoka yi tshalagazhanadang// nags tshal bzang po de dgakyang// rgyal ba yis ni mngon par sprul// mgon po
ri rnams ra rnga la// blo gros chen pos bskul ba dang// so so rang rig brjod pa yi// chos ni gnod sbyin rnams la bstan// stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo sde dag/ ri bo la nim lus bshad
ston pa dang ni rgyal sras rnams// de da du yang mi snang gyur// gnod sbyin 'bod bgrogs ngag gis lus// khyim na gnas par mthong ba dang// bsams pa 'di go su zhig snyam//
bdag gis bshad de su yis shes// ci zhig mardzong ge gang gis mthong// grong khyer de dag gang du song/ dwasangs rgyas de dag zhing de rnams// rin chen nags bzangs de ga re// 'di
ni sgyu ma'am lam rol// dri za'i grong zhus bsnyags pa 'am// rab rib yin nam smig rgyu 'am// rmi lam mo shAmab byung ngam// bdag gis 'di ni gang mthong ba// mal
ma bskor tam du ba 'am// 'on te sems kyi spyod yul la// chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid dam// blta bamad cing blta ba'ang med// sna med sna bar bya medan// rang gis rtogs par
myos pa yi// byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so// gzhan du rnam par rtog pa 'di// sas rgyas dang ni chos ltar gnas// ji ltar mthong bzhin su lta ba// ra dag 'dren pa mi mtho'i
ngo ngo rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug cing// gang tshe sangs rgyas ma mthong la/ da'ajug med sangs rgyas man par ni// gal te mthong na de sangs rgyas// lang+ka'i bdag po gnas
shin tu gyur ba dang/ rang gi sanas gnang pa tsam du khong du chud pa/ rab tut+togs ma thag tu rnam par rtog pa'i rgya ba la gnas pa// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskalag/
gtsug lag khang thams cad la mkhas pa'i blo/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ bdag gi blo rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa// rtog ga ba'i lto ba rang
bra' bar lta ba/ gzhan kyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ gzugs sna tshogs 'chang ba chen po thabs la mkhas pa/ khong du chud par rtog par gong nas gong
