kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di na/ a la 'badud rtsi chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di'i/ a la la snyan pa'i rgyal po chen
de lta bu lags so// than dud 'gro'oskye gnas su skyes nga yang dunguste/ gang dag gi rna lamadu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grug ngar gyur pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen de 'tshog
bsags pa dag ste/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/ sangs rgyas thamasacad la lta ba dang ldan pa'o/gas// skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba
bgyis pa lags/ dag pa'i rtsa ba bskan pa lags so// de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su dag nas/ dud 'gro'i yul de las yongs su thar te/ mi'i
lus thob pa ra 'gyur zhing/ thob nas kyang tshar bas snga madranati/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanang la dad pa redanasA/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skyabar 'tshab de dang
pa/ dar skye bar 'gyuran/ mar gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni de ltar sems can rnams kyi don tshan nga lags
sang bcom ldan 'ad gangadag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs de'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs ' gnas par 'gyur ba 'gas
du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'isangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas myur du blan med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'ibyang nub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur 'a gso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag la nga 1 byams pa legs so lags so/ 'byams pa khyod
kyis ji skad smos pa de ni de bzhin no// de ni bden no/ 'od ni kho na'o// de ninanor ba'o/ de gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thetshom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang
dag ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag jatshon med par nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ rgyu mar yang dag par
ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag la 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ nga rgyu la
dang sor sna dang/ khrob dang/ gnod sems kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ 'di'i lus ' 'am nad dam nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yul gangan mdo 'di lta bu 'dzin
pa dang/ chos skaba gnas pra 'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags bamaM du bris te yod pa'i yul der nad dang/ 5 myos kyi nad dang/ gnodra ra dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/
'khrug pa thamasamud rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcos/

ldan 'das sladu mAtshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig ra ra 'gyur ba'i dusal bab cing/ sangs rgyas kyi byung chub 'jigapa'i 'agyurama'ijig ba chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pan/
bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de dag la gzibyin brtsal bar bgyi'o// yul gang na mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i/
yuladar/ bdag gis dus ma lags pa'isir bdang/ dgung char dang 1 nu gdang/ bro nad ya nga ba dang/ mi ngas dang/ yums kyi nang dang//
'go ba'i nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrag pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang nachos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ slegs bam du bgyis ngad 'am/ rgyal
mtshunagyi rtse mor btags dra 'a mchod pa bgyid pa ri yul der bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmagatshogs thams cad dang/ rtsom rkun dang/ srin pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i/
ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur ro// gang dag na nog spab 'di lta bu dugadang/ mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i 'a de bdag gis 'odogarung/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ ma dag dang
lem dang 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bad be thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa khyod//
can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang/ dong zhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su bskyang ba'i phyirage rtsa
chen po bgos te seng ge 'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad kyis/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i mes nug/
pa'i dus la babacing/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs nga 'i dus la bab pa'i/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams
cad la bstan par bya'o// rang tu bsag nga ra bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag gi nyes pa bskyed par bya'o// den dam nga 'i des zhing tshad mar byas la// mngon par brtson ra ga 'as
gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgag nga ra bya// don dam pa 'i chos nyid khon las brtsams te dbang du byas 'a bstan par bya'o// ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnamagrang
'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ma 'ag ngar don rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' byamasangs gsolang/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar tsa le/
danag dbang ngo dang bcas nga'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dngo bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mjug tu phyin pa'i dus
la bab par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dang 'gams dpa' chen po byan ga nga la lha'i me togadang/ bdug pa dang/ sdes dang/ ma tog 'phreng dang/
byug pa dang/ phya na dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dag gis mchod nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can dpag tu ma/
/@#/ mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyig pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa legs so zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang/
[D] ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka3stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltabu thos par dkas/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnamagrus 'dikhrung zhig 'dzagar bris thig 'tshongs
shig lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ ro dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzu'agasan/ bam
ldan 'dus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grang 'di ga na
lartsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig 'byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yung thung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/
byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dapa' de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i ny+tsakhor de dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/
lham yan dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa la mngon rarab stod do// 'phags ra bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i
mad rdzogs so/// chos kyirgya mo/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le 'u bcu ste//
(sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad Thalam sbyor la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad ba/ sems
thag pa nas nyon cig/ mang ngo tshogos pa yid bsdus te nyon cig/ bdag lakun tu ltung bar yod pa shesano/ mthol tshangs byos shig/ mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro// mthong
tshungs na lus nu/ sdig phyir zhing thab tu skye'o// kun tu ltung ba dan/ ma skyabar 'khod cig// kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no// legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnamus dang/ dge bsnyen
dwang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig/ saMngs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyin/ mchod rtena' a chos byed pa'i tshe/ so sor thar pa 'a brtson cing lci ba dang 'gus
shing rin mar byos shig/ so sor tharang zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no// tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa lasasnang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so// mi dbul po las nor
na po thob pa dang mtshungs so// nad pa sman rud pa dang mtshungs so// btson khri mon nas phyung ba dang mtshungs so// lam ring por gong ba la slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te/ 'di
[t]@#// ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon ras/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do// 'jigs pa'i sems ni sku dka'/ dgab
sems ni g.yo dka'athas na/ kha na ma tho ba las bsdus te med snyam du byas na/ chu'i thigs pa rung mod kyi/ rgyunagyis na snod chen po gang ngo// yud tsam gyi bar bar du sdig byas
nga sun/ bsti med pa 'isems can dmyal bar ltangang// re zhig mi'i lus stor na/ bskal pa khri'i bar du yang+ge slar mi'i lus mi thob bo// dur ba'i ngo mi srid do//
ra dwaper na ni lta brgyugs pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe yang rtag ngo med dra/ dpa' rgyal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ringagasonamod kyi/ sang giganya' yang dka' 'o// da dus kho na la bab
! kyis/ nang pa'i rims so so nas ke nas gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa sngatsalanga'i rigs so// bag bus le la bla khyad dang/ nyal ba dang/ gnyid kyis 'ag cing/ rang nyams
kyis yid mi bya'o// mtshan zhinganagams bstas 'a9/ rtag par dkon mchog gsum gazungs su bzung 'a// phya' pa don med pa laM/ nyon mongs ngal rnyid cing tshogs du ma la yang ba
tu 'gyod pa mthar ci'ang thobang med par mi bya'o[” ]/mang po'i nas gcig nas gcig tu tshu'i khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig/ de'i tshon sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad/
[/]kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gang+ga'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med ba'i chos kyi sgo mo 'a mdo ste/ 'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu nyugamA'i ma go red do/ gsum 'das pa'i gang
rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do// daltar gyis rgyas la yang de bzhin bcad d// ma 'ongs ba khrisangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro// dus gsum
gyo byang nub sems dpa' labs pa dang/ slob ba dang/ slob par 'gyur ro// ngas bskaT pa brgya'i bar du soms kyi gnas 'di byas pas na/ nga'i mkhanopo rdzogs longs spyod
ra'i sku zhes bya'o// khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad do cog gcig nas gcig tu sems can thams cud la sems kyi gnas lam phye zhig/ dunas rasmyo'i snying po'i smon
kyi khamasaMn/ gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang nge ba'i sangage'i gdan gyi stang nas/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog steng gi thog gi sing rgyu la sbran
pa'i sems kyi gan sakyichos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su bzung la deng zhig/ yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas/ sems can thams cad la
mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod do// khyod la sadogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig/ de nas me tog stong gi thog gi
sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya yang phrag stong gi[“]shakya thub pa basmo'i snod kyi khams na/ lha'am lhang nge ba'i seng galegri las langs te/ so so nas mchi phyal 'tshal te
phyir nur nas/ lus kun gyis bsam gyisami khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/ 'od na gyin ng nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas sta/ cig car gros med ra'i me tog sngon bo/ sor po/ das
bo dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas/ man du sems kyi phyi mo 'i 'a'akhashin pa yang khong du chud nas/ so sor ba'i snod kyi khams kyi
nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyi skal ba stong ri dkyi nang du nub nas/ ma tog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung pa'i gnas su slar song ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du
phyin nas (rang bzhinagyi skal ba me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'irgyalapo'agadanadang ('od shin tu bzang ba'i khang par 'dug nas/ phyogs bcu'i rjesargya mtsho
rgyudang mtshungs pa bshad do// de nas ya nga seng ge 'i khri las 'angs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnamagyi pho brang duphyin nas/ gralabcu'i chos khashad do// de nas zung ma'iganamadu phyin
tolas su bya babcu bshadado// de nas yapakhri 'a sa langs te/ rgyal chen rig bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas/ phyogasangashing lta ba bdu bshad de/ gdan sa yang 'dug pa'i sa nas lang
la/ te 4 baphrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas/ bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad do// de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/ gnam bden gnam du phyin nas/ sa bcu'i rtsis
bshad do// de nas yang bas na gtan gaN+Dig gi nang du phyin nas// rdo rngabcu bshad de// de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyin ng du phyin sa/ bzod pha bcu'i sa bshad do//
denas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas/ smon lam boru bshad do// de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang rten re reb dbang mchog 'du mchod gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho
brang du phyin te/ nga'i brog ma phyi mo 'i pad+mo me togasna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyisasems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo 'i le'u bshad pa bshad r//
gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrug stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te 2 gnyis su mod de// tha dad pa yang med do/ 'basam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bar
do= de'i sngo shAkya thub pa pad+mo'am rtogasnod kyi khams kyirar phyogs nas byung nas/ lding ba'i khang ba'i nang du zhugs sa/ bdud kyis ches gnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/
mas babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka phyi lar skyes nas/ yum gyi mtshanon lha mdzes nan me/ yabakyi mtshonazas gtsos/ nga bdag gi ming nisi tar zhes bya ste/ lobatsunan
rab tu byung/ lasum cunas sangs rgyas su phyin nas/ nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya sta/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas//
[Ov]dbang ba'i chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal bo'i pho brangad phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa ba'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de 'dzisangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma chen po gnam gyi rgyal ngo/ dra
sgyu ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir/ grangs med pa nikhams dper na dranga'i bu chu dang mtshungs par bshad na/ khams gcig nas gcig so so'imi mthun te/ tha dad pa'i grangs med
de sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// ngas khams 'dir lan brgyud stong phyin to/ khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri stang du 'dug ste/ dpang po chen
po'aganam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas 2 du'inang ginang du thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo bya'o// de nas gnas kyi pho brang nas mar babs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang chub
kyi shing drung du phyin nas/ de'i sa'i snying gis nag can blun po ma 'bras rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi ma rdzogs 'angs snod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang bshad do//
sems thog ma g.yos pa ni/ rtag mar 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klogago/ rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims gcig no/ gangs rgyas kyi thog ma'i phyi ma yin no// byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ thog ma phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bod kyi sa bon no/ e can thams rud la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal ba yod de/ 'thams cad kyi shes ra
dang/ kha dog dang/ sems dang/ yid dang/ sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo[']dekyi nang du 'dus su/ tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod
nanas yod do// rtag par yun du rtag nga/ra chos kyi lus yod do/ 2so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni 2 gangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas/ chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus/
gsum gyis nas can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to// ngas ra mang 'di'i phyir brad nga 'a mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do// rdzogs 'ad/
spyod dang bdag ste// pa po'i dbus su gdodo bzhugs nas// ma 'bazhi'i me tog stong gi steng// shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs/ ma tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya
khams sde gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/ kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas susen// de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa steng// rdzogs longs spyod
pa rang bzhinalus// sngol pa 'bum phrag brgya stong re// kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren// cig car nga yi gnas su 'ongs// sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon// zil[°]
dang sgo mo de nas bya// phung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong ngo// slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin// kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs// nga yi mkhan po tshul
khrims kha ton lhags/ shAtshul khrims tshan bo rtogs dang lta bcu brgyad// tshul khrims snang khyad ni zla bzhin/ 'gacig tu nor bu yang rdo 'dra 'byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran
bzhin// 'di yi nagyis sa nga dag 'grub// gdod na rdzogs longs spyod nga nyid kyis bklags/ gangasakyang de bzhin kha don bklags// byang chub sems dang 'a gsar slob pa//
klod la khyar zhing khrims gathung bzhin// khyabu bzhin gcig tu sems can ston// nga yi bde blag rtag pa/rakon// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod// so sor gyur yas
rab bzhin// mang nga yi dra kun brtag par che// khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin pa/ 'ong/ 'dra yigangasargyas phyin zin kyang// rtag par 'di bzhin yid res byed/ tshul
khrims le'u kun rtogatshang yin// yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyus khrims kyis bsdu// sems can sangs rgyus khrims nod pa// de nas sangs rgyas
sa ru phyin// tshor chunas dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang de kun gyis gus par byas// sems gcig brtul te nga klog nyon// de'i tshe na shAkya shug
pa'i sangs rgyas/ thogam byang nub shing drung bzhugs// blan med pa/'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa byang chub bo// byang chub sems/dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dun pa ni/ pha ma dang//
dge 'dun dang/ dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang yid dang mi 'ga' bar bya'o// sri zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'galangani/ chos zab mor thub pa'i gzhung ste sri zhu'i
ming ni tshul khrims// ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang/ gtong ba'o// de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo// de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub
sems dang 'a rnams dang/ gzugs yod pa 'a khams kyi gnas babargyad dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnamarim pa drug gi ming dang/ rgyal po chen pa rnams thal mo sbyar te/ san/
gcig tumanyananas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po bklags te/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams la bka' la ra/ nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi tshulakhrin su kha ton du klog go/ khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha donadu lhagasashig/ sems g.yogs
phyogs pa bcu dang/ g.yo zhing bskyid nga bcurang/ rdo rjebcudang/ sa bcu'i byang ba sems dpa' rnams kyang kha ton du lhogs shig/ 'ong na tshul khrims kyi 'od kho nas
b.ru// byung ste/ rgya yod rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang/ dmar po// se ra de/ dkar pa// nag po'ang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems
kyang ma yin/ yod ngo 'ang ma yin/ mad nga 'ang na yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo / byang nub sems dpa' thams cud kyi
ni lan gyi rtsa ba ngo san/ mang po hran sa rud dang 2 sangs rgyas kyi bu rnamasna kyis rtsa ba'i phyi ma zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzungaba'i rig
sa legs nga la bslabs pa ni rigs so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams rtag nga ra nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po che sradang
dag slong pha mes dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi gnas bco brgyadadang/ 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang/ gdol pa dang/ nyid grub dang/ phogayang dang/ mo g.yang dang//
bran pho mo sa dang/ lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ phyag bar n dang/ byol song dang/ 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i mi la sogs te/ chos kyi mkhan nga'i tshig mda' phrad pa'i rnams thamA
cad tshul khrims mnod du rung ste kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka'asul// raso sor thunaro/
phas pham pa bcu yod do// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos pani tshul khrims 'di kha ton du ma bklags na byang chubs mas dnga' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon dang ma yin/
nga'ang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klogago/ 'a bsu zin nga 'i byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad dang/ phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dapa' thams cad dang/ da ltar slob nga ni byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdotsam zhig bshad kyis/ bslab cing gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs so// sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi/
bu rnam 'baka'us 'a[']ra/ bdagagis bsad pa dang/ ma gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang/ thams cad kyis gsod pa la sdod ra/ gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sen sa pa// sngag
ngang rngadanobyas te bsadar// gsod pa'i rgyu/ gsadod pa'i rkyen/ gsod nga 'i chos byed da// gsod pa'i las byed nga 'a gsU to/ sems dang de srog land kar gsod du
mi rung/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par snying rje ba dang/ sri zhu che zhing mi 'ga' ba'i sen sa rtag par g.yos te/ bgag kyis sems can thams cad kyi ram da
dang = 'or pa bya ba'i rigs so// bdag gis rang nyams byas te/ snying tshim par sems can bsad na/ denabyang chub sems dang phas ngam nga 'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bag
gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha legs pa ma byin par len du bcug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin pa rab ngs sam/ mabyin nga ra len pa'i rgya/ ma byin par len/
pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par lan nga 'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyor ba la sogs te// lhamAsrinadang/ bdag nga yod pa dang yang glo'i rdzas dang/ nor rdzas so cog la khab
dang 4 rtswanyag ma gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangasaM su mi rung ngo// byang chub sems dang 'an 2 sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ 2 sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing/ bsang shing
snying rje bar byas te/ rtag par sems can no cog gi yon tan dang bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so// de la slar log par ma'i nor rdzas ma phyin par blangs na/ byang nubasems
dnga'i bas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bag mi tshangs par spyod dan gzhan yang nA rnyings par spyod par bstan nas/ bud med do cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang/ gan
la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod nga 'i rgyu dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang/ mi rmongs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod nga'i las byed pa dang/
byol song dang/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo la mi tshongs pa ngo spyod pa dang/ chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems
can thams cad thar pa'ir mda' bya zhing/ chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so// de la slar mi'i rtog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/ byol song dang/ ma dang/ bu
mo dang/ sring mo la sogs te/ gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod ba byas te/ byamasushing snying rje bamed na/ de ni byang chub sems dang ki phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas
kyi bu bdag gis bskrun byas sam/ pha rol po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis bskrun byas pa dang/ brdzun gyisgyu byas pa dang/ brdzun gyi rkyen byas ba dang/ brdzun
gyi myos byed pa dang/ btsunagyi las byed pa dang/ mthong ba la ma mthong nas zer/ ma mthong bu 'a ni mthong zhes ze// lus dang sems kyis rdzun byas pa dang/ byang chub
sems dapa'i ni rtag pa ra tshog drang bo skye zhing/ gcig tun sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar 'ag nga'i sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi dung ba dang/
yon rol lta ba dang/ yon de 'a las byed par bskyed na/ de ni byang chub sems dang 'i pas pha ma pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu skye ba'i khu ba bdug 'tshong ngam 2 ba 'gas ngo
skyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis skyoba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/ skye ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ skyo ba'i khu ba 'ong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ skye ba'i khu ba 'tshong
@#// ba'i chos byed dam/ sgo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/ sgo ba'i khub 'o rtog 'tshong du mi rung/ so ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha nam tho ba skato
[D] byang chub sems dar 'ani sems can thams cado la snang zhing/ thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i gsan/ slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed
na 4 byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang/ ma byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dge slong dang dag slong ma'i nyis pa/
bdag gis 'phyas su byas sem/ gzhan 'phyas byed pa/rnabastanA tam/ 'byupa'i rgyu byas ma/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang/ 'phya ba'i las byed na//
( byang chub sems dang ldan par 'dug dang/ theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi/ songs rgyas kyicho[@]nang nas ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying
rjebaskyed de/ ngan pa'i rnams theg pachen de la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslabs pa ni rigasan/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sar 'gi ngar sangs rgyas kyi chos
la nyas zhes bshad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdagagis bdag bstod tsong/ phar snod ba dang/ gzhan la bdag bstod
yar skyod dang ston pa// spyod pa'i rgyu// smod pa'i rkyen byed pa// sbyong ba'i chos dang/ smod pa'i las byed na/ byang nub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rkyen par sna
dbab cing/ ngan sems pa ni bodag gis blangs te/ dag zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigasan/ la la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni bgad/ gzhan gyi rigs pan
banyabos te/ gzhan la snod/ sa bab par byas na/ de ni byang chub sems dang 'pha su pha ma pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag sogs che 'am/ gzhan ser snache bar ston tan
ser skya che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ sa' snache ba'i rkyen byed dam/ solasna'i chos byang dram/ ser sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs sa ceg dang/ gzhan ci red/
pa bzhin dgongs so// byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing/ sems la gshe ba dang/ dong tse gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtswa nyagam gcig mi ster ram/
chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na/ tshig gcig le'u gcig rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar drag ngan pas spros te baban/ de ni byang chub semasu dang 'i phas pham pa'o//
sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro 'am/ mi ma lags pa khro bar ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam// khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khroba'i sa rud dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems
kya/ dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing/ 'thab cing rtsod pa med por byas l/ rtag par snying rje skyed cing/ bya ba'i rigs kyi phyir 'ag par/
sems can thams cad kyi nang na/ sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing 'a ga nga sa 'tshog pa dang/ ral gridang dbyig pas gad ba cing/ bsdogs kyang snying brtse ma bris te/
wAphalags po 'byed cing tshig 'jam pos 'chugs shing/ gnong bar yang khro ba'imadud nga ma bkol na/ dan byang chub sems dpa'i phasar ma pa'o/ gsungs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig
gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tAnaM/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i/
myos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dang 'a nimur 'dug dang/ ma rabs kyi nang tshig gtsug/ sangs rgyas kyi sgraskad lo yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong thos
na mdung rtse gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na bdag gi lan ma yin zhes zer ba lta smosakyang ci dgos te/ yid ches nga'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems
bskyod pa'i gsan/ sara'ag rar ma rabs log pa lalta zhing/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ 'dag zhugs spyod nga 'i rnams/
byang bsems dnga'i so sor thar ba 'di bslabs ba'irigasaso// 'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rungan/ tshul khrims bcu tshang bar zhig nga lta smos kyang ci dgos//
la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshigang zhig na/ da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dang rtsisoms bskang pa'i sa lamanus te/ rgyal de'i gral yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal
bo'i gral yang stor 1 dag slong dang/ dge slongama'i gral yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs bcudang/ bskyed cengagasab bcu dang/ chos rdorje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang//
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag ra/ yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad pa'i skor nas// ngan song gsum du lhung sta/ bskal pa ba zhig gsum gyibar du pa mdang/ dkon mchog
gsum gyi mingamakhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na ga cig kyang ga zhig tshumi rung ngo/ 'khyed la 'dogs pa byang chub sems dang 'bas dang/ slob ra dang/ slob da ra 'gyur ba'i
rnams tshul khrims 'di b.ru bslabs la gus bar byos// rtag pa ragazungs sus zung ba'i rigasAso/ 'gasal bar ni le'u brgyad khri'i nang nas rgyu ru bshad de/ sangs rgyas kyis/
byang chub sems dang 'a rnams la bka' stsal nga/ phas pham pa b.ru ni bshad zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po 'grul thob pa'i tshe dang/ 'khor la
[7]@#// bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshodwang/ blon po'i la thob pa'i tshe dang/ sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nod nga 'ib/saso// 'ang tang lha ma srin
thams cad kyang/ rgyal po'i phug dang/ blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang skyabs byed do// sangs rgyas thamasacad kyang dgyes so// tshul khrims thob zin na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal 'i
sems dang/ sems legs pa'i bya ba'i sems pa bskyod de/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan bro dang/ slob dpon dang/ theg pa chen dalatshungs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang/ man/
bar mthong ba dang/ las mthun par byed pa mthong na'angs ti/ bas la phyag 'tshal tanadra dri ba'itogs so/ byang chub sems drang ni mar dregs pa'i sems dang/ le lo'i sems
dang blon pa'i sems bskyed do/ ma langs ma bsu phyagam byas te/ ci la'ang chos bzhin du rjes dang/ rimo dwang/ bdag gi lus dang/ yul mkhar dang na pos mos dang/
nor na po che bdun la sogs te nor 'o tsegakhatsos la/ dgos soreg ma sbyar te/ de ltar na zhusan ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la 'a med kachang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes/
te 4dag pa'i bsod nams grangs me rta lo sor ro// la la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang/ lag gis chang snod blangs te/ mi pha rol po la byin te bludan/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i
bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/ bdug 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jilta ste/ mi 'u tsog than sa rud dang/ sems can thams cad 'chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo//
bar g drang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag ched kar 'thus ra dang/ pha rol po la bdar ba ni ltang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sharnyed kor bros pa dang/ kotseg
bzar mi rung sko/ khros na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis bon chud pa ga/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na 'jigs nas song nga/ 'ad ltabasan byang chub sems dpa'
sems can gyi sha bza' mi rung ngo// grwa thos pa ni sdig grungs med do// sha zo na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dkub rnam lta brdar mi rung ngo// sgogapa dang/ btsong dang
rgya sgog dang/ ri sgog rnams dang/ shing kun dang/ 'di rnam lnga kha zas sotsog gi nang du bza' mi rung ngo// la la zhig ched kar thosan ltung ba'o/ sangs rgyas kyi bu sems
can thams cad kyig tshul khrims brgyud dang/ tshul khrims lnga dang/ tshul khrims bcudang/ rtsa b rnamabazhi bshig pa dang/ 'ag pa bdon dang/ gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khriA/
bshig pa sdig byed pa mthong n/ mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i gas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' m bstan te/ mthol tshangs byed ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug
gdug cing/ tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims brashar ng 'tsho/ sdig dngos su byung gis/ nyes pa mthol tshangs
[Di ]byad du chug cig/ ma bcugan ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po sgrig pa chen po 'a lhan cig tu lta bo/ lhan cig tu las byed pa// dga' dun gyi khang khyim dang/ mkhar du kho
pa mthong na/ rgyang grags stong gi 'a ma na tshur 'ongasan nibasu/ 'gro bani bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur sti dang/ rimarang/ nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya/ nyi ma
gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha thus dang/ bri stanadang/ chos kyi mkhan por 'dod decig dgos kyang kun sbyor to/ byin la rtag bar chos kyi mkhan po gnyor te/ dus
gsum du chos bshad de/ nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la/ khro ba'i sems dang/ mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so// chos kyi phyir lus dang
bsdos te ros gsol lo// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o/ gsungs rgyus kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang mdo sde 'di pa'i bang khyim chen po'i nang na rtog 'chad ra/
yodan/ byang nubasems dang 'gag/radu slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer ti/ chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la// gsol tedri zhing mnod pa'i gsaso/ kal la/
[zhig ri dang/ tshal dang/ shing gi drung dang/ dgra 'dun gyi sarung/ khyim gyi nang dang 2 chos 'chad de cig gi sar phyin par byas ta/ mnyanacing 'dod do// de'i gnas su song ste/
ma mnyan ma ma nos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sa nas nii theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ga dang/ tshul khrims la 'dug kyang/ khar sman sangs
rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zeran/ ga par thig rang chung ngu rnam gnyis dang/ nur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing/ log par lta ba 'o rog gi tshul khrims dang/ chos kyiyigega'adu
gu bzung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyibu mind kyis btabab cog rtag pa'i m gro byas te/ gso/ 'a sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na/ dag pa'i bsod rnams rnam pa
brgyad kyi nang na/ nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o/ pha ma drang/ mkhan po dang/ dge 'dun dang/ slobam dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba nad decog gi btab cing

nyonamo na/kun kyang gan+d+ho ti sos par bya'o kad la byang chung senA dpa' semA can la ltagag zhing/ n gnas emA kyis dge 'dun gyi khyin dang/ yul mkhar du ma phyin ra/ g.yu dang/ ri lu dudang/ mkha'i rang tshul nanar nga tAdu

d mthong ste 'amada' dang rimagro ma rgyun khyungaba'o//sang+ga kyi bural gridang ma'i gzhu dang mdung dang/ sta re la sogs ta 'thab mo'isdad/ mtshon chadang/ semA can gatod nga 'i smad dang 'dra ba rgya rgya bo 'gag pa dang dus
rung ngo// byang chub sems dang 'ani pha ma gzhan gyis gsod kyang sha mi thanan/ sems can thams cad gsod pa lta smos kyang ci dgas/ mtshon cha chad la
ba 'chang ban ltung ba'o// 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam rU nibaslabs te/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so// 'ogam le'u drugagi nang nargya cher bshad de// sangs/
pa rgyus kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems M ngan pa bsams te/ nyi 'og gi yuladu phot+tar 'grul bdamag gi g.yul bshams
du dmag bskyed nas 'thabs ti/ sems can mang nge bsadan/ byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing/ phan tshun du 'grul yang mi rungan/ red kar gsal
gyi ngagrabyed nga' lta smos kyang ci dgos// de la ched kar byed pani ltung ba'o/ sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang/ bran sa mos dang/ phyugagadagasna drug dang/ gshin sgom ro
gzhug ra snod la sogs pa bdang tshong sngogs bdag gis kyang bgyo ba'i mirigs na/ gzhan 'o byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos to/ de la chod kor byed pa ni ltung ba'o//
sangs rgyas kyi bus/ngan sa nas bskyod de/ 'dogs pa dag ba des nga/ chos kyi mkhan po/ dge 'dun rgyal po/ ya rabs btsun pa la ma nyes par log pa bdunaM dang ma/
pa bcu dang/ pham dang/ bu pho nubodang/ gnyen pa rnamajug gi tshul khrin sa bshig go zhes bskuran/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing/ byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la
slar log nga 'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde nga'i gnasasu lhung na ltung ba'o// gangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ ched kar me chen po btang 'a/ ri dang tshal/ g.yadang ri lung dang/
dbyar zla rab man chad/ stonozla tha chung yun bsregs sum/ saMl zhigagis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang byin dang/ mkhar dang/ grung dang/ dge 'dun gyi khyim dang/ zhing dang/
spyod zhing dang/ lham srin dang/ bla'i 'khor la gags te/ bdag po yod do cog gi nor rdzas bsregatum chung nga// la la zhig gis rnyed kar bsragasan ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas
kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi slobam/ bdag dang/ mur 'jug dang/ gnyana rnam drug lasegs te/ dge ba'ikhashes gnyenan cig kun kyang/ ci'ang thug ratshon po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims
nod cing/ gzungs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so/ ' gzhung dang lugaMs shesashing/ byang chub sems dang 'asems bskyed pa dang/ bskyed cing gsol ba'isems bcu dang
rdo rje'i rtog kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go rims dang/ chos kyi cho ga shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la/
byang chub sems dang/ sa ngan sems dang zhe sdang bskyed de/ gzhan nyan thos theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang/ yi ga dang mur 'dug dang 1log
par lta bu'i bshad r bstan pa na ltung ba'o 1gang sa rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i goms kyis sngar theg pa chen ngo'i gocha dang/ tshul khrims dang/ yi ge bslabs nas// rgya char phu nas
gzhungag ro ru brob shes nas// byang chub sems dang 'a gsar du slob ra rgyang grags brgya stong gi lam nas/ theg pa chen po'i yi gongang tshul khrims 'dod cing song ba mthong na/ chos kyi
phyir dka' thub spyod ra chos bzhin bshad pa'irigs// dko'athupa cas byabani lus bsregs pa/ 'ga' bgrogasar/ 1 sor mo bsregs pa 'o/ 'de 'a lus dang/ lag
par dang/ sor ni bsregs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la 'on du ma gsolan/ de ba tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no// stag dang/ srang kidang/ songs rdzogs/
pa 'a 'dogs pa dang/ 'dre ldog pa la sogs pa thams cad la 'as kyi shadang/ rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/ byin la/nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i
rtsog bshad de sems ni bya/ yid ni gol bar bya'o// de 'khyang chub sems dpa' badagagaso ba'i la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dablon pa'i rigs pa rim slan gyi/ yi ge dang/ tshul khrim//
ri mo dang/ 'bru phyin ci 'gatu bshad nams/ snga phyi med par dkon mchog la 'brazhing ba da nga ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha bra sa dang/ nor rdzas dang/ gso ba'i 'dang/
mi snyan pa'i phyir/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu rang/ blon po chen po la sogs dra gnyen zhes zer to/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/ btsun ngag gis bsdigs te/ nan gyis nor
dang kho tshol lo cogagi ming ni ngan pa mang po tshel zhes bya'o// gzhan la'ang snying rje mdatsang/ sri zhudang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi cha
tshul khrims dal ton du klog pa slob na/ nyin gcig/cing dus drug tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khri nas bzung/ de'i gzhung dang donamangasargyas kyi ngo bo'od shes par bya'o// byang
chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mnyamA par/ sgyu ma'i tshig dunus zhes zer ba ni/ bdag 'kharas shing bslas/ gzhan la'ang banas te/ tshogs
cog rnam pa gcig kyang na shes par/ gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston lo ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi dudan sems bskyedan/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na
pog stod khyer te/ byang chub sems dang rigs las byed pa la// mthong nas phan tshunaganyis kyiso rang tu dpar btugasto 1 'phags pa'i mi la bdes ma shin byed cing/ ngan mi byed pa med do
bzhi/ @#/ zhes bskur te/ de ltabu chadakar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rjesdad de/ ci'ang mi gsod par btangaba'i las byed cing 2 pho 'o tsegan
bdag gi 'dra yin/ mo 'o rogani bodag gi sayin/ bdag sngon chad kyi tshe rab sa' gang skyes cog na yang/ dadag las ma skyas ba med ngan/ 'gro ba drugagi sems can bdag
b+hU gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zosan/ bdag gi pha ma bsad do// gcig tu nabadag galus rnying pa bsad de/ nas dang na thams cad ni bdag gi'as snga na yin no/ me dang
rlu ngo cogonabadag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas/ rtag par gson par btang ba'i'as byed/ gar rgyas skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de/ bdag gis 'or ba
dang ramada' byas te/ nyon mongs shing 'phongs pa thar pa'o// rtag par byang nub sems dang 'i tshul khrims bshad de bstanabaslabs nas 1senatsan thar nga'i ra mda' bya'o//
ma mdang/ bu pho dang/ nu bo zhig shin/ de'i nyin ra'achos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na/ de'i bsod nams kyis shi bde sangs rgyas thamA
cad dang phrad de[.]mtho'i sasu skye'o// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o////tshes kyirgya mo/ ban roganyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'di ltaste/ tshul
[ro ]khrims 'di bcud rlabasan/ sems gus par gzus su bzung ba'i rigs so// sdig bkru ba'i leba'i nang nas kyang/ tshul khrin sa gcig bu gcig pa nas rgya che zhing gsal bar
bshad do// sangs rgyas kyis 1 sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsalang/ khros ra 'i 'a na khros pas ma rlan/ badregs pa'i lan brdegs pa sa mi blan/ pha ma dang/ su nu bo gnya na rnam
drug bsad kyang sha bran du mi rung ngo// gzhan zhig gis bdag girgyal po bsad kyang sha blun du mi rung ngo// srog bcad desha glon nasri zhu'i chos dang 'gal la// bran phogol ngag ngan
das spros shing brdegs la nyin gcig ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la'ang sdig grangs med na/ ched kar lag pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub
sems dang 'a la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs nga'i shan pa red karabyed na ltung bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung staci'ang mingashos par/ bdag
dbang po rno lamadzongs pa rlom zhing/ la la ni 'o gangs rgan zhing phyogs btsan pa bsams te/ la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang/ mang du shes pa dang/ dbang che ba dang 3
nor rin po che sna bdunam nga du bdog pas/ rgyags dregs can nad rtsis shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang/ tshul khrims mi gsol mnod/ chos kyi mkhan po la la ni rung chung/
'al ni na gzhon/ la la ni thabs chung/ la la ni dbul/ la la ni dbang po ma tshang mar legs ba'i nas dben pa yod de/ chos kyi yi ga dang tshul khrim rag ste/
cog zad par shesan/ byang nub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo// chos kyi slob da pon ma rig pa dang/ thabs la 'dra gang du bltasangashing/ chos kyi mkhan po yang dag
ts+tshA pa'i bden ra ri gzhung de cog gsol zhing/ den dum 'ongs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin/ ge nas dag pas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod
'dunan/ gangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi sngonaM sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mtho tshad phul/ ltas
bzang bo mthong ba ni tshul khrims thobab// ltas bzang po ma mthong nani/ zhag bdunaganyis// bdun gsum/ 'a gcig gi bar du ltas badrang po mthong ba'i drod kyis bzung ngo//
ltas bzang po mthong nas// sangs rgyas dang byang chub se na sa ranga'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnodado// ltas bzang po ma mthong nA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nos kyang/ ming tshul khrims thob bo zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad byung chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nodan//
ltas bakhrang ngo ma de gus so// de ci'i phyir zhe nA/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tur stan pa sun/ ltas bzang bo mi dgos te// chos kyi mkhan po de'i nun du tshul khrims masgo/
nAtshul khrims kyang thob ste/ gus ra 'i sems skyo'o// rgyang grags stong la mtshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan bomod la/ sungasargyas dang byang chub srems dang 'i gzugs
kyi spyan sngar tshulakhrims nod na/ ltas bzang nga mthong bar dgos so/ 'chos kyi ma khan pa la la zhig/ bdag theg pa chen pa'i yigurang/ tshul khrims shes pa dang/ rgya'i yo
dang 4 rgyal bu dang/ blon po rnams byams shing/ mdza' ba bsnyegs te/ byang chub sems rab 'a gsar du slob pa// chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang/ tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'di'i
'ongs ba la bar s ba'i sems dang/ ngan pa'i sems dang/ le'i sems kyis/ gcig du gcig dus/ 'dri nga'ilanam blunanaltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bsos
rgyas kyi sa dang/ tshul khrims kyi yig rang/ theg pa chen po ni drang ba'i chos// drang por ma thongab/ drang po'i ngo bodi/ drang po 'i chos kyi lus kyis 'thus par slob cing spyod
sgom mi nus pa rnams zhi/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par ltas te/ theg pa chung du sa rnam gnyis dang/ tshur 'dug gi chos dang/ marabs kyi gzhung la
bsten pa dang/ A bi la dar ma bshad nga/ slob dpa dang/ theg pa chung ba'i yi ge dang/ 'dug par sloban/ da ni gangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ban nad
ngas 'am 'gog pas bsgribs nga'i rgyu rkyen gyis/ byang nung sems dang 'i lam ma yin no// de lta bu med kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das ba'i phyika
rtog 'chad bya bdag po byed pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang/ ston cing 'phrular 'badag po dang/ bsam gtan du 'jug nga 'i bdag po dang/ 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag
bo dang/ de ltabu byed na/ byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ mi mdza' sto 'thabacing rtsodara'ang dgu bar bsdum pa'i rigs/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dag par bsrungs//
ma 'ongs par mi spyad/ bdag gis bdagagi skor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o// de la las 'ag par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang/ rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog
gsum gyi nor phyung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dgo 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la/ byang chub sems dang 'a dang/ dge slong 'gron pa zhig phyisnyadge 'dun gyi khang
khyim dang/ mkhar dang/ grong dang/ rgyal po'i khyimadang/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tsho rang/ 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ sngon 'dug r 'i dge 'dun gyis 'ongan ni ba/
ngasgol yod pa'i sar/ rnage ma'am/ dge 'dun gyi bdug pa rims sum bas phyag phyogs dag la rgyu nor bdag gi sgom/sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chu
'gronani bskyal te 2 bras kyi bsti stang dang/ khang khyim dang/ nyal ba'i mal cha drang/ khri dang/ sna sna nas ban de smin no// la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gi 'dus//
dang = bu yodang/ bu mo dang/ btsongs te ci 'dod pa kun gyur te spyin dgos te/ sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te drag 'dun pa la dang/ dge 'dun gyi 'gron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi
nor skalapha yod pa'i sar/ dga' dun gyi khyin bdag pos dge 'dun 'gron pa rnams rigs kyis gnyer babatang ste/ de'as dge 'dun snga nas 'dug bas// bangag 'bagazhagaganyer
bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'gron pa ma btang na/ dge 'dun gyi bdag mo sdig grangs med nga ra thob ste/ byol song dang mtshungs so// dge sbyo ngam yin 2 shAkya'i rigs kyis
don yang ma yin te/ de ltar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang go rims su ma bab par/ logs shig tu yon blangs shing/ bdag gir bkur du mi rung// de lta bu'i yonagyi
nor rdzas ni/ phyogs bcu'i dga' dunodabang ste/ de lags shigatsumanos shing khyer na/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdagagi sgor khyeran/ bsod nams rnam pa brgyang dang/ sa
dang 4 ba rtam byung nga'i sbyin bdag gi dge 'dun gnyer te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsa' nas/ dge 'dunagyi nang du song na/ dge bskos la dris/
derang go rigs gang la bab pa gnyar na/ phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun rdzob bo// gud nas dgro bcom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dge 'dun ldabcu gnyer ba bas/
go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gtor babasodan nas che'o// de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer bano/ mur 'dug na nga'i chos so// sangs rgyas bdunal
ni gud nas gtar ba'i chos medad// sri zhu'i 'a na dang 'gal bas// gud nas dge 'dunaganyer ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems sdud de/ gsong pa'i kha'i phyir/
samosakyi gam nga 'tshong ba'i bdagadan cing dran byed pa dang/ bdag rdungatho/ bdug 'du ba phos mos kyi mtshan lta na 'a ma bzang ngan 'grol tho zhos zer/ mo zhes zer//
lag pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor brar/ dgrab slabang ni chos byed/ dugag rog sbyor zhing byed la/ dugartsi rnam pa brgyadastong byad de sbrul dug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug
dang byad stams la sogs pa snying rje yod med nga lta bu/ ched kar byas n ltung ba// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed do/ bdag gi lus kyi dkon mchog gsum la skur ba byas te/
gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/ kha ni stong pa 'chad/ lasani yod ra'i las byed/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang/ skyes pat+tisman byed cing/ mi tshangs par srong nga ra sbor ti ci la'ang/
mi 'jigs shing tshogs pa med/ dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'inyi ma dang/ gcig la zla ba gsum gsum na chod ston rtag tu byed pa'itsi/ sems can gsad/ rkun po dang rtsom
ba byed cing 1 mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di btubaslabasal/ rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs sa/ 'khrims bzung ba'i le'u'i nang
nas kyang rgya cher ma ngon par bshad de// song sa rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na/ ngan pa'i dus mur 'dug rang/ mi ngan nga da
cog dang/ rkun pochen po sangs rgyas dang 2 byang chub sems dpa' pha man tshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ sa dang tshul khrims kyi yi ga 'tshong ba mthong ngom/ dgaslong
dang dwag slong ma 'tshong ngan/ gcig tu sams bskyed nga 'i byang chub sems dang/rwa 'tshong ba dang/ la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngagasar 'i 'byung nas/ bren pa bran mor
byas pa zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong na byams pa 'is/mas bskyed de// thabs kyi ra mda' dang skyabs byas te/ gnas gnas na 'god do reg kyang/ slar slob chung
ston cig/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang/ dag slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ chos dang/ tshul khrims kyi yi ga thamasacad nor
yi yod na/ nor gyis blus shig/ de ltar na byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyus kyi bu 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshonam dang 2 mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang/ tshong phyogs byed pa dang/ srang dang
ba chung 'chang ba drang/ rtsa lag snyems shing mi gzhan nor len pa dang/ sems la phrag dog byed d/ pha 'gas ngo bcings drags byas ba dang/ des so dan du yod pa zhig btang 2 byi
la dang/ sel byi dang/ khyi dang/ phag dang/ bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo// de lta bu chod kar gson ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sams bskyed de/ phos mos la sogs
nga 'brab pa rig la lta ba danag gi g.yul rung/ dag chon pa byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo// yang gcig tu dung bud pa dang/ nga gling dang/ gyim shor dang/ jang dang/ gling
bu dang kong hi 'u dang/ glu len pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo// cho rje dang/ mig mangs dang/ par rtsig gi rtsed mo dang/ ra 'dri lug dmag gi rtsod ma dang/
pho 'ang rdob pa dang/ rdo 'phan gyis rtse ba dang/ bum bu la bde bu 'dzin pa dang/ khras byed pa dang/ me 'ang 'byud pa byar mi rung ngo// rtsa tshab dang rgya cang dang thor bu kha
rub dang/ mi'i thod pa dang/ de rnams la mi gdabatu mi rung ngo// rkun re/rI than gyi dzanya' sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung nga// de ltar redakar dusanaltang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
tshul khrims thub par gzung ba'i rim gro byas na/ 'gro nyal 'dug langs dang 2 nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton bklags na/ rdo rje dang mtshungs// skyal pa thegs pa/
mtsho chen po rga2 ba dang mtshungs so// gcig tu na dge slong rtsa sa bcings pa dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po' dag zhing yid chesang 'isams rtagaparab skyong la bdag gis shesapar sa/
pa nga ni da dung sangasazlos su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgya saso// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams nisangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang nub tu sems bskyad de/ bar chud par sems
la bsams la/ de la skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang/ mur 'dug lngasun sa kyis bsam na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag pa/rasmono 'a ma thams cad ba sel 'a//
pha mdang/ mkhan po dang/ dge 'dun dang/ dkon mchog gsun 'a sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag daran khan ra mkhas nga dang/ tshangor ra sprod du mtshungs
nga'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad da/ rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yig dang/ khrims dang/ g.yo zhing phyogasar b.ru dang/ chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang/ sa bcu 'a
ka @#// sogs ra bdag bye zhing shes la/ chos bzhin du las byed par sman to// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bakhru du la/ srin thub par bu bani bskad cing gso gso
dbang chu dang/ lus dang/ srog kyang bor te/ mag la semag dang 'i bar mi b.rud pa ra sen sa bsam mo/de la byang chub sanas dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na
( ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po ba ru ston pa'i 'ogatu/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzungs su bzung ste ka smon lam 'dibazhin du gdab bo// bdag gi lus 'di ni
chen po'i chen pos tshig kyang rung/ khung zabam dang/ ral gri'i ro la song yang rung ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ga dang/ tshul khrims mthur mi zhig pa dang/
nan du'ang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad la sogs pa mi byed par smon to// gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lcags bsregs pa'i dra ba dang dalta burgya mo'i rim pa stong gis bskor
te/ lus dkris kyang thar yun du tshul khrims draluba'i lus kyis dad nga 'i sbyin bdag gis gos thams cad mi go bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon te// kha
'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu lumabasags pa dang/ me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ong ba la bskal pa brgyastong gi bar du 'an kyang tshul khrims bshig pas khas dad ra'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams
rud mi za bar smon to// yang gcig tu sngon 'am 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di ma chen pos bsregs// lcags kyi dra ba dang/ lcags bsregs pa'i mnga' steng du bag la kyang tshul
khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i spyin bdag gi khri'i 'og gi steng du mi 'jug dang smon to/ 2yang gcig tu smonalam 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdung rtsa ba gsum pa sum brgyas
gatshugs kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims bshig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i spyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad me khra bar na to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon te// lus 'di bskal
pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi thungs po cha tshu ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims 'di 'dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i spyin bdag gi khang khyimamo cog dang/ ldan pa dang/ skyed
zhing dang/ zhing gi stang du mi 'dug par smon to// yang gcig tu smon 'dun 'di ltar smon to// lus 'din go nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun busu brdungs te/ rdul phra mo
bzhin du gtong yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems ma da ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus/ngashing gus par phyag ma 'tshal bar ston to// yang gtsug tu smon 'am 'di ltar skyon te// stong phrag
brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang/ na dung rtsas mig gnyis brus shing gags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis 'dogs kyi kha dog bzang po la mi blta bar smon te//
yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// yang gcig gis bslang bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang rna ba'i rnam bar btsugs
kyi kyang thamar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan nga la ma nyan par ston te// yong gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to// bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing
bzhogs kyang/ khrims dral ba'i sems kyis gos so cog lami snyom par son te// yang gcig tusmon lam 'di ltar smon te// bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du rtswa ral gris bcad gtubs
h+pha kyang khrims dral bsams kyisani ro cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'i cog la mi bza' bar ston to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar sten te/ sku ri rnon des lus bcad gtubs kyang
mal khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bgrang bo la mibaskams ni rnal/ sa par ston to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smonito// sems can no rtogs ngas rgyus su yod pa'
ston to// byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang/ dbyar bsam gtan
du 'jug pa dang/ tshul khrims su 'jug pa songashing dang/ srin bya dang/ chos gos gsum dang/ ralab dang/ lhung bzing dang/ gding ba dang/ gsal byed dang/
pog der dang/ chu tshags dang/ lag phyis dang/ gri dang/ gtsub shing dang/ gtsub stan dang/ snang tsher dang/ tha gu'i khri dang/ dar mdang/ khrims dang ka gas
rgyas kyi bu spungs nga 'i yon tan spyad nga 'i ra grong rgyu ba'i tshe/ 'gro zhing 'ongasan/ rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gron/ yo byad bo brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa
yon tan nga ni dpyid ra ba'i tshes bco ldan s/ dopyadablatha chung tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o// ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bcoldan s/ dgun zla la blta'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bcib
lus dang mi 'bral// dpur na bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o// de sta gso sbyin gyi nyi ma lags r du slobang 'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zlab phyed phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcud nga/
ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi kha ton du lhags shig/ de sta khrin sa bklag nga 'tshe/ sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dnga' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sman par gzugs
dang ngagazugs brnyan gyi spyan sngarami gtsagagis kha ton bklags la// gcig gis 'tho' tshangs bya ste// gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gang yang rung ste/ stongo brgya de'ang mi/
gcig gis/kha don klog go/ kha don klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la/ nyan nga ni dma' ba 'a 'dug go/ so so nas chos gos tshur bu dgu pa dang/ lta nga dang ka bdun pa dag
khyu/ gtatshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chog bzhin du'o/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod nga 'itshe/ bgags yod cing mi ba da pa'i nang du ma 'gro zhig//
[Pr ]yul gyi bgegs dang/ rgyal bo ni bskrun pa dang/ sa mtho dman dang/ rtsi shing zang mo dang/ dbyar seng go dang/ stag dang/ sbyang ki dang/ chu ste/ rlung gi bgags dang
ts+tshA hun po rnon podang/ sprul gdug ba'i lam la sogs te/ bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo// do'atshad kar 'ong ba ni ltung ba'o// sang
rgyas kyi khu chos 'di bzhin du rim nga sa 'khod cig/ tshul khrims sngar sa pa ni sngar 'dug cig/tshul khrim phyis shog nganabyis 'dug cig rganagazhomi lta/dag slong yodang/ dgaslongamong pa 'gyur
btsun pa dang/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/ nyung grub dang/ dran pos mas la so gas nga tshul khrims nos pa ni sngar 'dug cig/ phyis nas ra na phyis go nas bzhin du
'dug cig/ mar 'dug na nga dang/ mi glan pa bzhin du rgyan yung chung/ gzhon yang rung/ snga med phyi med pa'i go mis med pa ni/ g.yung po dran gyi chos gong/ sangasas/
kyi chos kyi nangani/ snga man steng du 'dug phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/ byang chub sems dba' na tshos bzhin du go rims su ma 'bod na ltung ba'o/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag bar/
sems can no cog bstan cing bton te/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim bya cing ri dang/ tshal dang/ ra ba ngang/ zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang ba byas la dbyar dgun du tshul pa
bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang/ gtsang ma'i 'jug sa 'dzugs su gzhug pa'i rigs so// de la byang chub sems dang 'a sems can no cog gi phyir thag nga chen po 'i chos dang/
tshul khrims kyi yag bkrol bshadran/ naman tshu byung byung ba dang/ yul gyi bgags dung/ dgra'i bgogs dang/ pha ma dang/ phu nu dang/ mkhan po lasogs pa thog ma
sha ba'i dus dang/ bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang/ bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang/ bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang/ bdun bdun gyi nyin la/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ga dang tshul khrims
bkrol ngashad de/ mchod ston byas te/ dge ba'i bsod nams thob par gsol cig/ 'gro res kyang gson po'i ra bsod namasu byed pa la me chen pos bsrugs/ mun
pos khyer/ rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang/ gtsong dod dang/ mtsho chen ri 'dagu'i bgegs la sogs te/ sdig gro cog bgegs dang lan gyis na 2 mtshan s mod
ba bdun/ bgegs brgyad lag sgril/ rkang sgri'/ ltung dang/ lcags dang/ lus bcings drags te/ gal ma zhing khro mang po dang/ blun zhing gan da mang po dang/
ubya/ natsamang po'i dgra zusan/ kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i rtsis kyi yi ga dang/ tshul khrims kha ton bklags te da ko la bshad do// byang chub sems du ba
[>gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la/ gus par rtag par gzungs su zung zhig/ goms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che
zhing mngon par bshad do/ (sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyus kyi bu la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyus kyi bus mi'atshul khrims shig sbyin n/ bye brag dbya'ang gdan du mang
rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po chen de dang/ blon po pal dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dgo bsnyen dang/ dbag btsun mo dang do bo gsematsho g.yom
dang gzugs kyi gnas bcong rgyud dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drugadang/ dbang pochud pa dang/ dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang/ kung rum dang/ bran phogamos
dang lha ma srin la sogs te/ thams cad kun khrims mnod du rung ngo/ lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni/ kha dog bsgyur bar ston la/ chos dang mthun par gyis shig/
bdog serang/ sngon po/ nog bo/ dmar bo/ 'amagos yan chad kha dog bsgyur// lus lags so cog chos te/ kha dog sgyur cig g.ya'a' gnangan mi'i gos su
bgo ba'// dge slong ngo cog gi gos ni/ than la pa'i gos dang mi ma thunano// thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe/ mkhan pos dri ba/ lung rtogs 'di la 'ag pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam/
zhes dris shig dang/ chos kyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ni/ log pa bdun byas pa'-i tshul khrims M/sbyin du mi rungang// leg pa bdun zhes bya banisangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag
phyung ba dang/ pham dang/ mkhan po drang/ slob da ren bgad pa dang/ lus kyi tshul khrims gtsangan bshig pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'phagasar bsad pa yin te/
'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te/ bsgribs pa'i tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo// gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo// rang 'byung ba'i chos ni rgyal da 'ang phyag
mi 'o// ba ma 'a 'ang phyag 'tsha'i ( gzhan r rnam po drug la byang zhes mikhya/ lhan srin 'a 'ang phyag mi 'tshal chos kyi ma ngan ngoskadangashes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi ' gnas
khong sta/ khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sanas dang 'tshog kyim khan bo sa ngan se nas dang khro nga ba nas bskyed de/ sems can n cog la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o//
gangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te yid ches pa'i sems g.yo bar byan/ byang chub sems dang sa gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa 'i tshos kyi mkhan po byas te/ tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba'i/
mi zhig khrongan/ sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong zhig/ mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyod la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig/ de la yang
yi tsho 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yo dan/ mkhan po tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so// bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na/ tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo// la la zhigagI
tshul khrims bcugazhigang yod na/ ma thol tshangs byed du chug cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i zhal sder kin mtshan drug tu pham pa bcudang/ ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi
tshul khrims kha ton du bklags la/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems thag nga nas phyag 'tshal ba'i tsho/ ltas bzung nga la bya dgos so// de la zhim bdun dang/ bdun gnyis dang/ bdun
gsum dang/ lo gcig tshun chud ltas bzung ngo mthong dgos sa// ltas bzang po zhes byakhani/ sangs rgyas gshegs to spyi bo la byugs te/ 'od mthong ba dang/ me tog mthong ba dang/
ltas ri'ang rang/ babrang po mthong na/ mod lasdig 'byed do// de la ltas bzang bo med na/ 'tholatshungs su zin kyang ma phan to/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob bo// 'ang
nyims bstan te slobs to byas la/ ltas 'od byung ba dag mgo na/ tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo// la la zhigags ltang ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni/ mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la
da 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so/ 'de bsan tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos/ chos 'di'i nang nas kyang/ gcig nas gcig nas khral namakhan po bya'o//
theg pa chen po'i yig dang/ tshul khrims yang ba dang/ lcab dang/ yin pa dang/ ma yin nga ri gzugs dam ba mi shes na/ gzhung gi mchog bden ba dang/ sngama'i rang bzhin
gyis bon dang/ da ltar bsnyad cing gsol ba'i rang bzhin dang/ gtan mi rgyag pa'i rang bzhin dang/ chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhinadang/ drang po'i rang bzhin dang/ de'i nang
nas rtogs pa dang/ dpyod pa'i rang bzhinadang/ phyi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yalag la sogs te/ chos kyi las bya'o// cho ga dang/ tshul khrims dang/ chos kyi yi
ha'adi gcig nas gtsug khong du chud de/ byang nubasems dpa' g.yo ba'i khe dang ming gan pa 'dod pa'i slob ma la khe bskam pas/ ngan dra btsal tem shes pa la sgyu mar chos
dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge kungashes so zhes zer zhing/ yon len nga 'i bdag 'a'ang bslus ngashing/ banas gcig tu na gzhan la'angabasus shing brtas te/ delta bu s mi lo tshul
khrims byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gas ba'i kha 'dod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ma mnos pa'inamadun du mur 'dug dang ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas
stong gi tshul khrims chen mo 'di bshad du mi rung ngo// log par lta pa'i mdun du mi rung ngo// rgyal por ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du'ang bshad du mi rung ngo//
[Di ]mi don pa rnams kyis sa ngas rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pani ma byol song zhes bya'o// gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing/ rdo shing dang mtshungs/ sems
med de/ zhing chos log pa zhes bya'o// lag pa la lta ba'i rnams ni gang dum dang na tshungs so// byang chub sogs dang 'de lta bu nganara'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi tshul khrims bzhi
debastanan ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byungan/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam posal mon kar sems bskyed de/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrim sabag
na sbyin bdag go cog gi yon bslang du ni mi rung ngo// gcig tun rgyal po 'i khab kyi sa ris ka'ang 'gror mi rung/ rgyal po'i tshula'ang 'thung du mi rung ste 'dre chen po lnga stong gis
go ngar de'i mdun bcad nas 'dren re/ dgra chen po khyim dang/ mkharadang/ yul gyi nang du 'ongs so zhes zer te/ de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyugs so//
'jig rten na ro yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro zhes zer te/ mig gis ma thong du yang mi dga' 'o// tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs// shing a
dang mtshungs te/ drang nge 'tshul khrin sa bshig na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te/ rtag par gzungasasu bzung ste/ kha ton du'ang klog go/ ngags pa/
bshus te shog shog byas/ khrag phyung bas ni snag tshar byas/ rus pa bcag pa ste sug gur phyag la/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ga bri'o// shing gi shun pa dang/ khrod
kar la bris te/ rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang/ rin med pa'i gos dang/ me togo la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzeb dang/ snod byas te/ nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrimA
kyi glegs bam gzhug go/ de la chos kyi bzhin du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi brtag par sems sgyu mar bskyedade/ tshul ma khur drang/ khang khyim mo cog tu phyin te/
sems can no cog mthong na/ khyed la sogs pa sems can no cog thams cad dkona mchog gsum la phyogs shing/ tshul khrims btsunosashig ces bsgo ba'i rigs so// byol song
gi khamasushig na'ang/ sems la bsam khar skyas te/ khyod ni byol song na/ byang chub sems dang 'a ni ri lung gAye thang la gnas kyang rung ste/ sems can no cog kun byang nub so
dpa'i sems skye bar byos shig/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems can m bstan ma btson ltungaba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ba rtag par bstan cing bcos pa 'i snying rjechen po bskyed// chos/
byed pa dang/ ya rabs la sogs pa srin bdag dang/ 'du ba mang po 'inang du 'greng la// gos sku bo gyon te chos bshad du mi rung ngo// gos skya ba yin/ 'du
mi ba mung nga 'inang du chos bshad na/ rjes kyi mkhan po ni/mthon par 'dug la/ spos dang ma togagis yo nagasol to// mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' kha 'khongan/ gus nga la
b+hU 1ga to// pha ma la sri zhumi 'gal bar bya ba dang/ slog nas mkhan po la bya ba bzhin/ chos la'ang de bzhin gus par bya'o// bram ze lha can chos byed pa bzhin du gus par byed pa
bzhin du gus par bya// de bzhin na byas te chos 'chad sa chos bzhin ma bshad n ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang the tshom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shing/
rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ slob ma sde bzhi dang/ bdag mtho zhing btsan sgams te/ song rgyas kyi chos dang la khrims bshig la// nan tur gyi chos byas te/ nga'i slob ma rnam
bzhi rab tu byung zhing chos byed pa ra mi starate bgags gcig tunas nigs rgyas kyi gzugs dang mchod rten 'dzugs shing/ chos dang tshul khrims yi ger 'dir mi stor te/ dkonanachog
'jig cing/ de lta bu tshadakar chos 'jig pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu dug ba'i sems spyod la rab tu byung zhig/ legs pa'i ming snyan nga la 'dod pa dang/ gso ba'i ba'i
phyir rgyal bo dang blon po 'a na dun du sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad du/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma la byang chub sems dang 'u khrims ma rigs par byin te/ slob
ma rnams bcingag btagasan/ seng ge 'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas/ sang ga bdag gi sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/ rin bus sha zos pa ma yin no// de lta bsun gar
rgyus kyi bu mur 'dug dang/ bdud kyis chos bshig pa ma yin no// bodag gis chos bshig pa yin na// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
kyi ma grobya bani/ pha mas pha ma bu gcig bu la bsam pa dang mtshungs so// pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o// tshur 'dug dang/ mi ngan nga la ngag ngan pa/ tshigangan ngas
gangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la skur pabaran mdung rtse khab sum pa 'i mdung rtse sum brgyas snying la btsugs pa dang/ ral gri stong dbyig pa stong khris dus brdzags pa dang ma tshub/
par bya sta/ bdag gi lus bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'asong yang ba'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'tshig gcig ngan du zer ba'i skad ni ni thos par ston to
bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims bshig pa gzhan la lan 'an pa dang/ zhar gyis zhar gyis tshul khrims bshig par bstan pa lta stes kyang ci dgos te/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal
hubya/ ba'i sems med de/ de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o// tshul khrims TAdi ragu bslabasan/ sunas gus par gzungs su zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi bu
[Di ] rnams tshul khrims yang ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag par gzungs su zung zhig ster 'das pa'i sangs rgyas drang byang chub sems dang 'u rnams ni kha ton zin to
da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni da ltar kha ton byas so// sangs rgyas dang byang sems dpa' phyis phreng ba rnams ni da de'i khar kha ton byed do//
sangs rgyas kyi bu'on cig/ phas pham pa b.ru ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyud cig dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis kha tonan/ daltar gyi kha ton byas/ phyis kyang kha ton byed do/
'ang de bzhin da ltar khadon byadad// de lta bsaM na khyed la sogs pas sems can phal mang du rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon podang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong mdang/
! dge bsnyenadang/ dag pasnyan mas byang chub gnas dpa'i tshul khrims zhes na/ 'grub pa'i kha ton boklags bkrol bshad de/ yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis
bskal pa rtag par 'dug ste/ khrims kyi glegs bam dus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'babang/ thogs pa med 'byas te/ sems can thams cad bstan cing bslab pa'i
rgyun mi gcod cing/ sangs rgyas mthong la// sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gcad de 1 tshe rab satshorabs su'ang ngan song dang bgegs brgyad kyi nang du'ang mi ltung zhing/ rtag
pa'i ma'i lam dang/ gnam gyi steng du skye'o// des na ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug sta/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phyab/ khyed la sogs pa snying
gcig tu brtul/ so sor thar ba la bslobasal/ dga' zhing gus par gyis shig/ gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nang nas/ gcig
lu gcig punas rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do// de'i tshe slob ma mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi kha tonabaklags pa thob nas/ sems thag pa nas spyi go
la khyer te/ dga' gzhu' nas rtags ragazungs su bzung ngo// de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyus kyi g.yan chod pa doTi'i tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pu'i sku/
sems kyi gnas sa kyi no'i 'bu'i nang nas zag med pa'i tshul khrims bshad zin te// stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi grub pa'i ng de bzhin no// dbang po chen po 'i gnom gyi rgyalaM
po'i pho brang nas// 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi le 'u yang bshad do// byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la bsgo ba
0 @#// bshad kyi mi lang// mang po pa la rtag par gzungs su bzu'// kha ton du lhagasashig/ de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa'i de yin no// stong
ba phrag brgya yang 'bum gyi khams parom tog snod kyis khams rdul phra mo skyed kyi khams kyi khamasaM cad kyi sems kyi snod/ tshul khrims kyi snod grangs med pa'i smon lamachu song yon
lan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i sgod de/ sangs rgyas thamasacad grangs med/ sakyi sgo mo'ang bshad zin to// stong phrag brgya'i khams kyi nang na/ se/
can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung sta/ dga' zhing gus pa 'a byed do// sems kyi gnas rgya cher phye ba'i gzungasani/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal po'i le'u'i nang nas/
bshad do// sangs rgyas bdunagyis tshog gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad ng/ bgrod pa'i dam ra/sa dka' thug
zhugs// bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'du'// gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub ma yin no// gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa///mig can mi bde yod las byol
te 'gro// mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na// sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spos// gsum ste thams cad skyob pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// gnod lami smra mi sems te
[&uz/ ]so sor thar ba bzhin du bsngos// zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya// gnas kyang dpon par 'dug par bya// rang rtasams dang ldan pa ni// de nas ngs rgyas bstan pa'o// bzhi
sta 'phog ngar dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa// ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/ kha dog gsung lagi gnod pa/// khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin// de bzhin byang chub grong du
spyod// gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar// gzhan gyis 'gus par ma byas pa'o// bdag rang nyid la ltos// kacu// rgya gar
sged du/ tsatu byad sprin ga wA/ bod skad du/ named rtenabaskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa// dkon mtshog gsum la phyag 'tshalal shes rab ldan mchog 'jig rten
chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor go/ shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus// ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus// mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yi// rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba//
ston pa chen po 'jig rten mchog/ rnam par 'dren pa//bdag la gsungs// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog/ ston pas de labaka' stsal pa// mchod rten
dag la phyag byas pa'i// yon tan gang yin phyogs tsam bstan// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lhagludabazhin gnod sbyin dang// shawa de bzhinasrina rnam
kyis 4 thams cad du yang mchod par 'gyur// dal ba rnyed dka' thob gyur nas// skad cig gcig tsam bar du yang// mchod rten bskorab byas pas ni//
kyi mi khom brgyad rnams spong bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// kha dog ldan zhing mdzangasar dang// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyu
mchod rten bskor ba byas pas na// lha dang de bzhinami rnams kyi// tsho'ing ba yang de yis thob// grags chen po'ang thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam
sbya bu gling da rus kyi mchog/ cho rigs yongs su dag par yang// blo ldan da ni skye bar 'gyur/ mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// kha bzhin dag kyang bzang ba dang// mdog
sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang// bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang// ser sna med cing gtong bod dang// sbyin
sgyu pa dag la dga' bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// yid du 'ong zhing bltan sdug/ mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang// longs spyod chen nga thob par 'gyur//
mchod rten bskor ba byas pas// 'du byed stong par mthong na yang// de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur//mchod rten bskor ba byas pa gzhi//
larigs mchog tu bde bar 'gyur// bu smad dang yang ldan pa dang// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bram ze che zhing mtho
bar skye// tshul khrims ldan zhing thos dang ldan/ 2 rig byed gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// khyim bdagacho zhingamatho bar skye// phyug cing nor
yang mang ba dang// nor dang 'bru dang ldan par gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas// 'dreg bu gling gi mnga' bdag rje// sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'i// nyon dang
ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// mchod rtenabaskor ba byas pas na/ karonachen bdun dang ldan pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzhin 'khor skor bar
byed mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ 'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro// sangs rgyas bstan la dga' b dong// rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// mchod rten/
bskor ba byas pas ni// lha yul drag nas 'phos na yang// de ni mi yi nang du skye// rmongs pa nod par mangal du 'jug mchod rten bskor ba byas posani// mngal gyi skyon dang
dri ma yis// de la gos par mi 'gyur te// denAnor bu dgo pa bzhin// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// ma ltar bde bar gnas par 'gyur// den bde bar bgo
ba drung// bde bar nu zhobatung bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phas kyang gsog 'khor mang po yis// de la gso zhing gnang bar 'gyur/
kyi ma mas rtag tu rim gro byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas na gnya du rnams kyi snying du sdug/ de bzhin pha ma lhag par byams// skyes bu 'das spyod 'phel bar 'gyur//
mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis// de la gnod ba mi nus te/ 1longs spyod dag la skyon med 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni//
bskal pa brgyar yang de dag rnams// zhar bsgyur dor yong mi 'gyur// lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas ng sani// mig kyang rnam par dag pa dang//
dkyus ring mthon mthing stag pa dang// lha yi mig kyang de yis 'thob// mtshos bskor babyas pas ni// lus brtan soms kyang brtan pa dang// de bzhin brtson
'gus brtan pa dang// dpung mgo zlum rnying brtan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// stobs dang byad gzugs phun sum tshogs// yan lag thams cad
mtshan rnams kyis// legs par brgyanatsang ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskorab byas pas nai// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje// rdzu 'phrul chen pa'i brgya byin du//
lha yi dbang po chen por 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas nai// 'thab bral lha yi dbang bo dang// de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan dang// 'a dga' gzhan 'grub//
dbang byed 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas nai// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenatshangs pa yi// dbang phyuganyid du de 'gyur zhing// lha rnams bye bsnyed kyis mchod//
mchod rten bsko'o ba byang ngasani// bskal pa bye ba stong dag dang/ khrag khrig phrag brgyadag tu yang// shes rab ldan par rtag tu mchod// mchod rten bskor ba byas
bas ni/ bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/ lus gtsang gos kyang gtsang bo dang// dkar po 'tshog dang ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// stobs dang
brtson 'grus phunasum tshogs// de ni le la mad pa dang// shin tu sgrubakyang yod par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas nai// brtson 'grus partan zhing nubru 'ang brtan//
rtsal brtan cis kyang mi tshugasashing// don rnams myur du grub par byed/ mchod rtenabaskor ba byas ra sani// gdangs snyan gasung yang mthob dang// yid du 'ong ba'i nga co can
gnod pa med cing nad med 'gyur// mchodarten bskor ba byas pas ni// nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi// gnas der myur du bder 'gro zhing// shas la skye ba thob par 'gyur//
mchod rten bskor ba byas pas na// dran pa nye la gzhag pa bzhi// sems kyi tshad med bzhi pa dang/ kardzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob/ 3mchod rten bskor
[Di ]babyas ngasani// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi po dang// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang// byang chub yan 'a ga' bras bu 'god// mchod rten bskor ba byas pa ni/ mngon
shes drug ldan zag me da nga// nyon mongs thams cad spangs nga yi// dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang spangs
nga dang/ 'ben rnams thams cad sngangs pa dang// rang rgyal byang chub thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas bsan// 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs//
mtshan rnams kyisani brgyan pa dang// gser gyi sku mdog thob par 'gyur// lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yan// ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin// yid kyi las kyang skor
ba yin// smon lam btab pa'i ng bskor ba yin// 'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis// snod kha bde dguradon rnams 'grub/ 'jig rten mgon po'i mnod rten la/
bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang// de ni tshig tsam nyi ma yis// 'gas par bstan par mi nus so// sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// shAri'i bus ni
cha zhus nas kyang// mchod rten phyag bus yon tan gang// 'jig rten mgon ngo sa bstan pa yin// rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya// ri mo'i shing rta brgya dog dang// rgod la
brgya yi shing rta rnams//rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang// bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'o// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// kam po dza yi bu mo brgya/ nor bu rna ru gdub
kor grogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang// mgrin pa gser gyis legs/brgyan pa// bskor ba'igom pa gcig bor ngani// bcu drug par yang mi phod de// gangs kyaglang
chen brgya snyed dag/ 'dus nanam tshongs yangs pa dang// sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i grung// gser dang nor bus brgyan pa yang// bskor ba'i gom dag gcig bor ba'i//
bcu drug char yang mi phod do// na khas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pagacig bor ba// 'dzam bu chu klung gsar spang 'bam grangs spyod/
de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim gong gtsug bor ba// 'dzam bu chu gling gsar gyi pha bong
'bum// de na de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas dang gang gis sangs rgyas ma tshor rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spangs// 'dzam bunu klung
gsar snod 'bum gzhag pa// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas rwa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' bkris ras kyis che/
de tog 'phreng ba 'dogs// 'dzam bu chu krungags ra khal bya ba gnyis// da ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga'

la rtan 'a/// dga' ba'is nas kyis mar me 'bul byed pa// 'dzam bu chu klung gser gyi bya ba 'bum// dan dedang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis
sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dugakhrab 'i nyen sa kyis rgyal na tshon 'phan gdugs 'dogs// gser gyi ri bo'i lhun pa tshad 'bum yang// de ni de dang mtshungs/ pa yod

ba rab tu shes pa de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin no snyam du sems la sems kyi rtog pa de lta bu skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las/

shes rab med// mingashes dbang du 'gro ba'ang ma yin la/ mkhas pa'i ng ma yin rmongs nga 'ang yong ma yin// gang dag shes rab 'du shes med pa de dag bde// ji ltar dgon
pa de bzhin grongan gnas// gnyis kar 'du shes mtshungs dang mnyam par 'jug/ grong gi spyod yul smod pa ra mi byed cing// gang dag dgon par mi rlom de dag bde// gang dag
tsa bsod snyoms khyim dang bcas par spyod// de dag bsod snyoms de yi 'dzushes med// bsod snyoms spyod pa bdag yin snyam mi sems// gang dag bsod snyoms 'du shag med pa de
dag bad// gang dag bor ba'i phyag dar khrod pa rnams// blangs nas lus la 'chang bar byed da dag/ bdag ni gos ngan snyam du de mi shes// gang dag gzhan la mi stod pa dag bdog/

bde= gang na bdagadang sems can yod min pa'i/ gang dag chos mchog dam pa 'chang byed pa// bdag 'chad mkhan yin par sems pa'i ng nor// gang dag med par ma gyur de dag
bde dkar po kun la yang dag bdu shes med// snying po dang ni rdzas su 'du shes med/ rakar dang gnag ra' gang dag ni sems pa// de dag gnyis su mi spyod de dag bde// gang dag
langs las 'das par 'du shes med// 'dug kyang 'dug par 'du shes yod ma yin/ hrin mtshon phyed par 'dug cing ngurtson 'grus rtsom// gang dag spros pa chod pa de dag bde/ gang

ra gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

la thub par snang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal da// kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyod lhag mthong la mkhas shing dpyod pa legs so legs so// de bas na kun dga' bo
